gui/menu/research/name/solid_materials_s.name: Solid Materials Storage - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/solid_materials_s.description: Thanks to the implementation of a containment compactor ray the resources for storage are reduced in size, while keeping their original properties. This greatly increases the overall capacity of the storage units.

awardsResolved.name: Solid Material Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Automatically gathers (using rift technology) and stores solid materials. It expands the global storage space for all solid materials.

gui/menu/research/name/defensive_buildin.name: Defensive Buildings - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/defensive_buildin.description: A set of upgrades for all defensive structures in the Riftbreaker base. These buildings are much more durable than their predecessors.

awardsResolved.name: AI Hub
awardsResolved.desc: Provides AI Cores that are required to manage more buildings with artificial intelligence like Sentinel Towers or the Repair Facility.

awardsResolved.name: Wall Gate
awardsResolved.desc: Opens automatically when the Mecha-Suit is in close proximity. Doesn't require Energy to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Heightened Wall Floor
awardsResolved.desc: Provides a higher defense position for the Mecha-Suit allowing it to shoot above walls and defend the base from inside of the walls.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_drone_atta.name: Attack Drone Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/towers_drone_atta.description: More advanced version of the Drone Attack Tower, with more drones available at the same cost of AI, sturdier construction and room for mods.

awardsResolved.name: Attack Drone Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Spawns defensive drones which hoover in the tower's operational radius and attack all enemies that come in range.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_drone_atta.name: Attack Drone Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/towers_drone_atta.description: More advanced version of the Drone Attack Tower, with more drones available at the same cost of AI, sturdier construction and room for mods.

awardsResolved.name: Attack Drone Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Spawns defensive drones which hoover in the tower's operational radius and attack all enemies that come in range.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_drone_atta.name: Attack Drone Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/towers_drone_atta.description: This is not a defensive tower in the strict meaning of the word. It is a hub that houses attack drones which get activated when an attacker enters the tower range. The drones keep attacking until the target is destroyed.

awardsResolved.name: Attack Drone Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Spawns defensive drones which hoover in the tower's operational radius and attack all enemies that come in range.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_heavy_arti.name: Heavy Artillery Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/towers_heavy_arti.description: Improvements contained within this blueprint allow the Riftbreaker to build a much more robust version of the heavy towers.

awardsResolved.name: Heavy Artillery Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots mini nuke explosive shells at very long distances. Can protect the base from enemies shooting from a long distance. Use with Radars to shoot farther than its viewing range.

awardsResolved.name: Mine Layer Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Spawns mines in the area of operation which in time create a mine field that is very hard for enemies to go through.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_heavy_arti.name: Heavy Artillery Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/towers_heavy_arti.description: Improvements contained within this blueprint allow the Riftbreaker to build a much more robust version of the heavy towers.

awardsResolved.name: Heavy Artillery Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots mini nuke explosive shells at very long distances. Can protect the base from enemies shooting from a long distance. Use with Radars to shoot farther than its viewing range.

awardsResolved.name: Mine Layer Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Spawns mines in the area of operation which in time create a mine field that is very hard for enemies to go through.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_minigun_lv.name: Minigun Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/towers_minigun_lv.description: An upgraded engine and loading belt give this iteration of the Minigun Tower a much higher firepower than its predecessor.

awardsResolved.name: Minigun Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Minigun version of the base tower. Very high fire rate makes it effective against a wide range of enemies.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_minigun_lv.name: Minigun Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/towers_minigun_lv.description: An upgraded engine and loading belt give this iteration of the Minigun Tower a much higher firepower than its predecessor.

awardsResolved.name: Minigun Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Minigun version of the base tower. Very high fire rate makes it effective against a wide range of enemies.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_minigun_lv.name: Minigun Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/towers_minigun_lv.description: A high fire rate defensive tower that is extremely useful both for crowd control, as well as taking down large, single targets.

awardsResolved.name: Minigun Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Minigun version of the base tower. Very high fire rate makes it effective against a wide range of enemies.

gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl7.name: Headquarters - lvl. 7
gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl7.description: Blueprints that allow the Riftbreaker to upgrade their Headquarters with new modules and functions. Upgraded Headquarters can support new structures and unlock access to better technologies.

awardsResolved.name: Headquarters
awardsResolved.desc: The central building in your base. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct, includes a rift portal and provides storage facilities. Protect this building at all cost.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_basic_lvl3.name: Sentinel Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/towers_basic_lvl3.description: An improvement over the previous version of the Sentinel Tower. Sturdier construction, more concentrated projectiles, more room for mods.

awardsResolved.name: Sentinel Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Basic defensive tower. Shoots high speed energy projectiles at a limited rate of fire.

gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_synthes.name: Resource Synthesizers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_synthes.description: More refined synthesis process described within these blueprints gives better results while using the synthesizer buildings.

awardsResolved.name: Carbonium Synthesizer
awardsResolved.desc: Synthesizes Carbonium from Energy. Can be used as an infinite source of Carbonium but consumes a lot of energy in the process which makes it not very economical.

awardsResolved.name: Ironium Synthesizer
awardsResolved.desc: Synthesizes Ironium using Energy. Can be used in an emergency situation when Ironium is depleted but Energy is abundant.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_basic_lvl2.name: Sentinel Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/towers_basic_lvl2.description: An improvement over the previous version of the Sentinel Tower. Sturdier construction, more concentrated projectiles, more room for mods.

awardsResolved.name: Sentinel Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Basic defensive tower. Shoots high speed energy projectiles at a limited rate of fire.

gui/menu/research/name/fusion_energy_lvl.name: Fusion Energy - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/fusion_energy_lvl.description: These blueprints contain a range of optimizations and upgrades for the fusion power plant, increasing its energy production capabilities even further.

awardsResolved.name: Fusion Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Very large energy output. Produces plasma resource as a byproduct.

awardsResolved.name: Plasma Converter
awardsResolved.desc: Converts Plasma into Supercharged Plasma by using large amounts of energy.

gui/menu/research/name/fusion_energy_lvl.name: Fusion Energy - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/fusion_energy_lvl.description: These blueprints contain a range of optimizations and upgrades for the fusion power plant, increasing its energy production capabilities even further.

awardsResolved.name: Fusion Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Very large energy output. Produces plasma resource as a byproduct.

awardsResolved.name: Plasma Converter
awardsResolved.desc: Converts Plasma into Supercharged Plasma by using large amounts of energy.

gui/menu/research/name/rare_element_mini.name: Rare Element Mining - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/rare_element_mini.description: Upgrade blueprints for Rare Element Mines. Improved drilling mechanism and refined screening algorithm give a better yield of the final product.

awardsResolved.name: Rare Element Mine
awardsResolved.desc: Mines rare resources like Uranium, Titanium and Palladium. Must be placed on an ore deposit and powered with Energy to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/nuclear_energy_lv.name: Nuclear Energy - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/nuclear_energy_lv.description: Redesigned blueprints for the Nuclear Power Plant. Increased size of the internal reactor gives housing to more fuel rods, which greatly improves the potential energy output.

awardsResolved.name: Nuclear Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: It has very large Energy output. Requires Uranium to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Uranium Centrifuge
awardsResolved.desc: Refines Uranium Ore. Produces Uranium for use in powerplants and crafting.

gui/menu/research/name/base_shields_lvl3.name: Base Shielding - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/base_shields_lvl3.description: Increases the amount of damage the shield can absorb before going offline.

awardsResolved.name: Shield Generator
awardsResolved.desc: Adds shield protection to all structures in a radius.

gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_energy_.name: Carbonium Energy - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_energy_.description: Enhanced version of the Carbonium Power Plant, increasing the electric output, while keeping the resource cost low.

awardsResolved.name: Carbonium Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Must be built on top of Carbonium ore deposit. Provides good power output but uses up resources from the deposit. Can use only unrefined Carbonium straight from the ground.

gui/menu/research/name/renewable_energy_.name: Renewable Energy - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/renewable_energy_.description: Improved versions of power plants utilizing renewable resources. These schematics contain a set of upgrades that make power plants better suited to the Galatean environment, thus increasing the output.

awardsResolved.name: Geothermal Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Must be built on top of a Geothermal Vent. Produces significant amounts of energy.

awardsResolved.name: Solar Panels
awardsResolved.desc: Provides Energy during the day hours. Shuts down automatically during the night, or when the sun is not visible e.g. during intense storms.

awardsResolved.name: Wind Turbine
awardsResolved.desc: Provides a limited amount of energy depending on wind strength.

gui/menu/research/name/auxiliary_buildin.name: Auxiliary Buildings - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/auxiliary_buildin.description: Upgraded blueprints for various supportive buildings.

awardsResolved.name: Radar
awardsResolved.desc: Provides radar coverage and enables defense towers to shoot beyond their viewing range. Detects hostile entities and shows them on the map. Great for spotting incoming attacks.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_plasma_lvl.name: Plasma Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/towers_plasma_lvl.description: Redesigned argon phaser thrusters give this version of Plasma Tower better propertiies and room for installing mods.

awardsResolved.name: Plasma Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots high powered energy projectiles with a decent fire rate. It's quite universal and can defend your base against creatures that are resistant to physical damage. Uses energy to shoot so can be a good diversification if your tower ammo production is struggling to keep up.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_flamer_lvl.name: Flamer Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/towers_flamer_lvl.description: This blueprint improves the nozzle and the fuel delivery system of the tower. The flames burn much hotter, dealing more damage as a result.

awardsResolved.name: Flamer Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Sprays burning fluid. Short range but very effective against numerous small enemies. Requires a Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/base_shields_lvl2.name: Base Shielding - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/base_shields_lvl2.description: Increases the amount of damage the shield can absorb before going offline.

awardsResolved.name: Shield Generator
awardsResolved.desc: Adds shield protection to all structures in a radius.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_flamer_lvl.name: Flamer Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/towers_flamer_lvl.description: This blueprint improves the nozzle and the fuel delivery system of the tower. The flames burn much hotter, dealing more damage as a result.

awardsResolved.name: Flamer Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Sprays burning fluid. Short range but very effective against numerous small enemies. Requires a Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl5.name: Headquarters - lvl. 5
gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl5.description: Blueprints that allow the Riftbreaker to upgrade their Headquarters with new modules and functions. Upgraded Headquarters can support new structures and unlock access to better technologies.

awardsResolved.name: Communication HUB
awardsResolved.desc: Allows communicating with Earth via quantum entanglement and downloading schematics for buildings and upgrades. Enables research. Transmission is instant regardless of distance but has very low bandwidth.

awardsResolved.name: Headquarters
awardsResolved.desc: The central building in your base. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct, includes a rift portal and provides storage facilities. Protect this building at all cost.

gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl6.name: Headquarters - lvl. 6
gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl6.description: Blueprints that allow the Riftbreaker to upgrade their Headquarters with new modules and functions. Upgraded Headquarters can support new structures and unlock access to better technologies.

awardsResolved.name: Communication HUB
awardsResolved.desc: Allows communicating with Earth via quantum entanglement and downloading schematics for buildings and upgrades. Enables research. Transmission is instant regardless of distance but has very low bandwidth.

awardsResolved.name: Headquarters
awardsResolved.desc: The central building in your base. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct, includes a rift portal and provides storage facilities. Protect this building at all cost.

gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl4.name: Headquarters - lvl. 4
gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl4.description: Blueprints that allow the Riftbreaker to upgrade their Headquarters with new modules and functions. Upgraded Headquarters can support new structures and unlock access to better technologies.

awardsResolved.name: Communication HUB
awardsResolved.desc: Allows communicating with Earth via quantum entanglement and downloading schematics for buildings and upgrades. Enables research. Transmission is instant regardless of distance but has very low bandwidth.

awardsResolved.name: Headquarters
awardsResolved.desc: The central building in your base. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct, includes a rift portal and provides storage facilities. Protect this building at all cost.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Uranium Handling
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: The properties of Uranium suggest that it could be used to improve some of the Riftbreaker equipment and technologies. This research will develop Uranium handling methods and discover potential uses for it.
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_energy_.name: Carbonium Energy - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_energy_.description: Enhanced version of the Carbonium Power Plant, increasing the electric output, while keeping the resource cost low.

awardsResolved.name: Carbonium Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Must be built on top of Carbonium ore deposit. Provides good power output but uses up resources from the deposit. Can use only unrefined Carbonium straight from the ground.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_artillery_.name: Artillery Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/towers_artillery_.description: A more advanced shell fired from a much bigger gluon launcher increases the damage dealt by this version of the Artillery Tower.

awardsResolved.name: Artillery Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots explosive shells at long distances. Very effective against groups of enemies. Can shoot farther than its viewing range. Requires a Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Rocket Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots explosive rockets at the enemies. Best used against groups of enemies or creatures that are vulnerable to area damage.

gui/menu/research/name/nuclear_energy_lv.name: Nuclear Energy - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/nuclear_energy_lv.description: Redesigned blueprints for the Nuclear Power Plant. Increased size of the internal reactor gives housing to more fuel rods, which greatly improves the potential energy output.

awardsResolved.name: Nuclear Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: It has very large Energy output. Requires Uranium to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Uranium Centrifuge
awardsResolved.desc: Refines Uranium Ore. Produces Uranium for use in powerplants and crafting.

gui/menu/research/name/auxiliary_buildin.name: Auxiliary Buildings - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/auxiliary_buildin.description: Contains blueprints for buildings with a more supportive role for the Riftbreaker base, such as the Radar buildings.

awardsResolved.name: Radar
awardsResolved.desc: Provides radar coverage and enables defense towers to shoot beyond their viewing range. Detects hostile entities and shows them on the map. Great for spotting incoming attacks.

gui/menu/research/name/renewable_energy_.name: Renewable Energy - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/renewable_energy_.description: Renewable Energy technology gives the Riftbreaker the option of producing electric energy with the use of natural processes, without any additional fuel. Such power plants usually have low output, but they are cheap and can be used en masse.

awardsResolved.name: Geothermal Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Must be built on top of a Geothermal Vent. Produces significant amounts of energy.

gui/menu/research/name/basic_energy_prod.name: Basic Energy Production
gui/menu/research/name/basic_energy_prod.description: Schematics for the most basic resource factories. They are not the most efficient, but low amount of resources necessary to build them ensures that the Riftbreaker always has access to these buildings.

awardsResolved.name: Carbonium Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Must be built on top of Carbonium ore deposit. Provides good power output but uses up resources from the deposit. Can use only unrefined Carbonium straight from the ground.

awardsResolved.name: Energy Connector
awardsResolved.desc: Connects buildings to the power grid within its operational radius.

awardsResolved.name: Energy Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Stores a significant amount of energy. Best used with intermittent power sources like Solar Panels to create an energy buffer.

awardsResolved.name: Plant Biomass Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Produces energy out of Plant Biomass from destroyed foliage.

awardsResolved.name: Solar Panels
awardsResolved.desc: Provides Energy during the day hours. Shuts down automatically during the night, or when the sun is not visible e.g. during intense storms.

awardsResolved.name: Wind Turbine
awardsResolved.desc: Provides a limited amount of energy depending on wind strength.

gui/menu/research/name/basic_structures.name: Basic Structures
gui/menu/research/name/basic_structures.description: These are the plans for the buildings that no Riftbreaker could survive without.

awardsResolved.name: Communication HUB
awardsResolved.desc: Allows communicating with Earth via quantum entanglement and downloading schematics for buildings and upgrades. Enables research. Transmission is instant regardless of distance but has very low bandwidth.

awardsResolved.name: Headquarters
awardsResolved.desc: The central building in your base. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct, includes a rift portal and provides storage facilities. Protect this building at all cost.

awardsResolved.name: Headquarters
awardsResolved.desc: The central building in your base. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct, includes a rift portal and provides storage facilities. Protect this building at all cost.

awardsResolved.name: Mining Drill
awardsResolved.desc: The Mining Drill is a highly specialized building that allows the Riftbreaker to breach the layers of the planet's crust and safely reach levels below the surface.

awardsResolved.name: Outpost
awardsResolved.desc: A miniature version of the Headquarters building. Can be constructed during planetary missions to transport resources from remote bases to the main base via rift technology. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct.

awardsResolved.name: Repellent Drone Hub
awardsResolved.desc: Repellent Drone Hub sends out specialized drones that spray the target area with a repellent substance according to the Riftbreaker's current needs.

awardsResolved.name: Seismic Laboratory
awardsResolved.desc: This building contains very precise seismographic equipment that collects data for large-scale geological analysis of the area. Needs a constant supply of water for cooling purposes.

awardsResolved.name: Carbonium Factory
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Carbonium. Must be placed on Carbonium Ore and powered with Energy to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Solid Material Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Automatically gathers (using rift technology) and stores solid materials. It expands the global storage space for all solid materials.

awardsResolved.name: Ironium Factory
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Ironium. Must be placed on Iron Ore deposits.

gui/menu/research/name/solid_materials_s.name: Solid Materials Storage - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/solid_materials_s.description: Thanks to the implementation of a containment compactor ray the resources for storage are reduced in size, while keeping their original properties. This greatly increases the overall capacity of the storage units.

awardsResolved.name: Solid Material Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Automatically gathers (using rift technology) and stores solid materials. It expands the global storage space for all solid materials.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_artillery_.name: Artillery Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/towers_artillery_.description: A more advanced shell fired from a much bigger gluon launcher increases the damage dealt by this version of the Artillery Tower.

awardsResolved.name: Artillery Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots explosive shells at long distances. Very effective against groups of enemies. Can shoot farther than its viewing range. Requires a Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Rocket Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots explosive rockets at the enemies. Best used against groups of enemies or creatures that are vulnerable to area damage.

gui/menu/research/name/basic_decorations.name: Basic Decorations
gui/menu/research/name/basic_decorations.description: Blueprints for non-essential structures that mainly serve a decorative purpose - lamps, floors, or flags all fall under this category.

awardsResolved.name: Basic Lamp
awardsResolved.desc: Provides light during night time, must be connected to the energy grid.

gui/menu/research/name/defensive_buildin.name: Defensive Buildings - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/defensive_buildin.description: Blueprints for a set of basic structures aimed at giving the Riftbreaker base a degree of security. While not the sturdies, they will do a good job in keeping the native creatures out of your base at the beginning of the mission.

awardsResolved.name: AI Hub
awardsResolved.desc: Provides AI Cores that are required to manage more buildings with artificial intelligence like Sentinel Towers or the Repair Facility.

awardsResolved.name: Rift Portal
awardsResolved.desc: Creates a rift in spacetime allowing immediate travel to its location.

awardsResolved.name: Sentinel Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Basic defensive tower. Shoots high speed energy projectiles at a limited rate of fire.

awardsResolved.name: Wall Gate
awardsResolved.desc: Opens automatically when the Mecha-Suit is in close proximity. Doesn't require Energy to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Heightened Wall Floor
awardsResolved.desc: Provides a higher defense position for the Mecha-Suit allowing it to shoot above walls and defend the base from inside of the walls.

gui/menu/research/name/fusion_energy_lvl.name: Fusion Energy - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/fusion_energy_lvl.description: The most powerful power plant available to humankind. It utilizes the process of nuclear fusion to produce massive amounts of energy. The byproduct of this process is plasma, which can be stored and repurposed.

awardsResolved.name: Fusion Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Very large energy output. Produces plasma resource as a byproduct.

awardsResolved.name: Plasma Converter
awardsResolved.desc: Converts Plasma into Supercharged Plasma by using large amounts of energy.

gui/menu/research/name/basic_resource_pr.name: Basic Resource Production - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/basic_resource_pr.description: More efficient versions of the basic resource factories. Optimized processes result in a better resource yield from the same amount of raw materials.

awardsResolved.name: Carbonium Factory
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Carbonium. Must be placed on Carbonium Ore and powered with Energy to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Ironium Factory
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Ironium. Must be placed on Iron Ore deposits.

gui/menu/research/name/biomass_energy_lv.name: Biomass Energy - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/biomass_energy_lv.description: This technology allows the Riftbreaker to make use of the biomass they gather on their mission in energy production. These power plants are low-cost and have a high output, but demand a constant supply of fuel.

awardsResolved.name: Animal Biomass Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Produces energy out of Animal Biomass from fallen enemies.

gui/menu/research/name/buildings_handlin.name: Buildings Handling
gui/menu/research/name/buildings_handlin.description: A set of tools that enable the Riftbreaker to carry out mass operations on the structures within their base - repairs, deconstruction, or upgrades.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_ammunition_.name: Tower Ammunition Handling - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/tower_ammunition_.description: Introduction of enhanced microfilament collectors in these versions of the blueprints greatly increase ammunition storage and production capacities.

awardsResolved.name: Ammo Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Automatically gathers and stores ammunition. It expands the global storage space for all ammunition.

awardsResolved.name: Tower Ammo Factory
awardsResolved.desc: Produces ammunition for Defense Towers.

gui/menu/research/name/gas_energy_lvl3.name: Gas Energy - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/gas_energy_lvl3.description: This upgrade increases the troughput of the gas installation within the Power Plant, increasing the potential for power generation.

awardsResolved.name: Gas Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Produces a significant amount of energy but requires Flammable Gas to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Bio Composter
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Flammable Gas out of Plant Biomass.

awardsResolved.name: Gas Filtering Plant
awardsResolved.desc: Refines Sludge to produce Flammable Gas which is used as fuel by the Gas Powerplants. Requires a constant flow of sludge that can be connected by using pipelines.

gui/menu/research/name/rare_element_mini.name: Rare Element Mining - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/rare_element_mini.description: This technology gives the Riftbreaker the tools necessary to excavate, mine, refine and store delicate and rare resources on an industrial scale.

awardsResolved.name: Rare Element Mine
awardsResolved.desc: Mines rare resources like Uranium, Titanium and Palladium. Must be placed on an ore deposit and powered with Energy to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl3.name: Headquarters - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/headquarters_lvl3.description: Blueprints that allow the Riftbreaker to upgrade their Headquarters with new modules and functions. Upgraded Headquarters can support new structures and unlock access to better technologies.

awardsResolved.name: Communication HUB
awardsResolved.desc: Allows communicating with Earth via quantum entanglement and downloading schematics for buildings and upgrades. Enables research. Transmission is instant regardless of distance but has very low bandwidth.

awardsResolved.name: Headquarters
awardsResolved.desc: The central building in your base. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct, includes a rift portal and provides storage facilities. Protect this building at all cost.

gui/menu/research/name/basic_resource_pr.name: Basic Resource Production - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/basic_resource_pr.description: More efficient versions of the basic resource factories. Optimized processes result in a better resource yield from the same amount of raw materials.

awardsResolved.name: Carbonium Factory
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Carbonium. Must be placed on Carbonium Ore and powered with Energy to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Ironium Factory
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Ironium. Must be placed on Iron Ore deposits.

gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_synthes.name: Resource Synthesizers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_synthes.description: Technology schematics allowing the Riftbreaker to construct buildings that synthesize Carbonium and Ironium at the expense of large amounts of Energy.

awardsResolved.name: Carbonium Synthesizer
awardsResolved.desc: Synthesizes Carbonium from Energy. Can be used as an infinite source of Carbonium but consumes a lot of energy in the process which makes it not very economical.

awardsResolved.name: Ironium Synthesizer
awardsResolved.desc: Synthesizes Ironium using Energy. Can be used in an emergency situation when Ironium is depleted but Energy is abundant.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_repair_lvl.name: Repair Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/towers_repair_lvl.description: A more advanced variant of the Repair Facility. A more refined internal structure allows the facility to house an additional drone, increasing the number of buildings that can be simultaneously repaired by one facility at no additional AI cost.

awardsResolved.name: Repair Facility
awardsResolved.desc: Repairs damaged buildings in a radius around this facility using automated drones.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_repair_lvl.name: Repair Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/towers_repair_lvl.description: A set of blueprints that allows the Riftbreaker to construct a hub housing maintenance drones. Once structural damage of a building is detected anywhere within the tower's area of operations, AI-operated drones are dispatched to repair it.

awardsResolved.name: Repair Facility
awardsResolved.desc: Repairs damaged buildings in a radius around this facility using automated drones.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Titanium Handling
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: The properties of Titanium suggest that it could be used to improve some of the Riftbreaker equipment and technologies. This research will develop Titanium handling methods and discover potential uses for it.
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/auxiliary_buildin.name: Auxiliary Buildings - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/auxiliary_buildin.description: Upgraded blueprints for various supportive buildings.

awardsResolved.name: Radar
awardsResolved.desc: Provides radar coverage and enables defense towers to shoot beyond their viewing range. Detects hostile entities and shows them on the map. Great for spotting incoming attacks.

gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_synthes.name: Resource Synthesizers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/carbonium_synthes.description: More refined synthesis process described within these blueprints gives better results while using the synthesizer buildings.

awardsResolved.name: Carbonium Synthesizer
awardsResolved.desc: Synthesizes Carbonium from Energy. Can be used as an infinite source of Carbonium but consumes a lot of energy in the process which makes it not very economical.

awardsResolved.name: Ironium Synthesizer
awardsResolved.desc: Synthesizes Ironium using Energy. Can be used in an emergency situation when Ironium is depleted but Energy is abundant.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Palladium Handling
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: The properties of Palladium suggest that it could be used to improve some of the Riftbreaker equipment and technologies. This research will develop Palladium handling methods and discover potential uses for it.
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_plasma_lvl.name: Plasma Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/towers_plasma_lvl.description: Redesigned argon phaser thrusters give this version of Plasma Tower better propertiies and room for installing mods.

awardsResolved.name: Plasma Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots high powered energy projectiles with a decent fire rate. It's quite universal and can defend your base against creatures that are resistant to physical damage. Uses energy to shoot so can be a good diversification if your tower ammo production is struggling to keep up.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_repair_lvl.name: Repair Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/towers_repair_lvl.description: A more advanced variant of the Repair Facility. A more refined internal structure allows the facility to house an additional drone, increasing the number of buildings that can be simultaneously repaired by one facility at no additional AI cost.

awardsResolved.name: Repair Facility
awardsResolved.desc: Repairs damaged buildings in a radius around this facility using automated drones.

gui/menu/research/name/rift_technology.name: Rift Technology
gui/menu/research/name/rift_technology.description: Schematics for the samll-scale version of the Rift Technology. It is used to quickly move around various points of the planet. Low-range portals are stable enough to remain open on their own, eliminating the need for additional electricity.

awardsResolved.name: Fusion Field Accelerator
awardsResolved.desc: Creates a powerful nuclear fusion field that accelerates condensed hyper particles to faster than light speed. Super charged hyper particles contained within a controlled magnetic field become the fabric of the quantum gate portal.

awardsResolved.name: Hyper Particle Condenser
awardsResolved.desc: Generates and condenses dark matter hyper particles using an array of Palladium core quantum condensers.

awardsResolved.name: Quantum Gate Stabilizer
awardsResolved.desc: Required to stabilize the quantum gate that contains the actual rift portal. Without this component quantum gate malfunction may disintegrate the object entering the portal.

awardsResolved.name: Rift Station
awardsResolved.desc: This is the big rift that can connect planets in different parts of the galaxy. Can open a rift back to Earth.

gui/menu/research/name/gas_energy_lvl2.name: Gas Energy - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/gas_energy_lvl2.description: This upgrade increases the troughput of the gas installation within the Power Plant, increasing the potential for power generation.

awardsResolved.name: Gas Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Produces a significant amount of energy but requires Flammable Gas to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Bio Composter
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Flammable Gas out of Plant Biomass.

awardsResolved.name: Gas Filtering Plant
awardsResolved.desc: Refines Sludge to produce Flammable Gas which is used as fuel by the Gas Powerplants. Requires a constant flow of sludge that can be connected by using pipelines.

gui/menu/research/name/biomass_energy_lv.name: Biomass Energy - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/biomass_energy_lv.description: Enhanced versions of biomass power plants. Less emissions, higher output, no increase in resource consumption make these a big improvement.

awardsResolved.name: Animal Biomass Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Produces energy out of Animal Biomass from fallen enemies.

awardsResolved.name: Plant Biomass Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Produces energy out of Plant Biomass from destroyed foliage.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Liquid Resources Handling - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: A set of upgrades increasing the capacity and throughput of all the facilities that handle resources in a liquid form.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Material Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Stores a significant amount of liquid or gas. Can store only one type of resource at a time and needs to be connected with Pipelines to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Pump
awardsResolved.desc: Pumps liquid resources from pools found around the planet. Pumps can not operate too close to each other.

awardsResolved.name: Water Filtering Plant
awardsResolved.desc: Purifies contaminated fluids like mud and produces clean water. Requires Energy to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Liquid Resources Handling - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: A set of upgrades increasing the capacity and throughput of all the facilities that handle resources in a liquid form.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Material Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Stores a significant amount of liquid or gas. Can store only one type of resource at a time and needs to be connected with Pipelines to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Pump
awardsResolved.desc: Pumps liquid resources from pools found around the planet. Pumps can not operate too close to each other.

awardsResolved.name: Water Filtering Plant
awardsResolved.desc: Purifies contaminated fluids like mud and produces clean water. Requires Energy to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/base_shields_lvl1.name: Base Shielding - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/base_shields_lvl1.description: This technology makes use of supercharged plasma to form a protective shield over buildings. The shield is generated by Shield Generator buildings that cover all structures within their area of operation.

awardsResolved.name: Shield Generator
awardsResolved.desc: Adds shield protection to all structures in a radius.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_flamer_lvl.name: Flamer Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/towers_flamer_lvl.description: An extremely effective tool against swarms of most small creatures. Engulfs an area in front of it in flames. The creatures affected by that spread fire further, take damage over time, as well as direct damage from the Flamer.

awardsResolved.name: Flamer Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Sprays burning fluid. Short range but very effective against numerous small enemies. Requires a Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/biomass_energy_lv.name: Biomass Energy - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/biomass_energy_lv.description: Enhanced versions of biomass power plants. Less emissions, higher output, no increase in resource consumption make these a big improvement.

awardsResolved.name: Animal Biomass Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Produces energy out of Animal Biomass from fallen enemies.

awardsResolved.name: Plant Biomass Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Produces energy out of Plant Biomass from destroyed foliage.

gui/menu/research/name/renewable_energy_.name: Renewable Energy - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/renewable_energy_.description: Improved versions of power plants utilizing renewable resources. These schematics contain a set of upgrades that make power plants better suited to the Galatean environment, thus increasing the output.

awardsResolved.name: Geothermal Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Must be built on top of a Geothermal Vent. Produces significant amounts of energy.

awardsResolved.name: Solar Panels
awardsResolved.desc: Provides Energy during the day hours. Shuts down automatically during the night, or when the sun is not visible e.g. during intense storms.

awardsResolved.name: Wind Turbine
awardsResolved.desc: Provides a limited amount of energy depending on wind strength.

gui/menu/research/name/energy_storage_lv.name: Energy Storage - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/energy_storage_lv.description: A new generation of energy cells that allows the Energy Storage to hold more electric charge at one time, while staying relatively small in size.

awardsResolved.name: Energy Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Stores a significant amount of energy. Best used with intermittent power sources like Solar Panels to create an energy buffer.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_ammunition_.name: Tower Ammunition Handling - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/tower_ammunition_.description: Introduction of enhanced microfilament collectors in these versions of the blueprints greatly increase ammunition storage and production capacities.

awardsResolved.name: Ammo Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Automatically gathers and stores ammunition. It expands the global storage space for all ammunition.

awardsResolved.name: Tower Ammo Factory
awardsResolved.desc: Produces ammunition for Defense Towers.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_plasma_lvl.name: Plasma Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/towers_plasma_lvl.description: High powered Plasma Gun in the form of a defensive tower. Very effective against large enemies with resistance towards physical damage.

awardsResolved.name: Plasma Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots high powered energy projectiles with a decent fire rate. It's quite universal and can defend your base against creatures that are resistant to physical damage. Uses energy to shoot so can be a good diversification if your tower ammo production is struggling to keep up.

gui/menu/research/name/energy_storage_lv.name: Energy Storage - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/energy_storage_lv.description: A new generation of energy cells that allows the Energy Storage to hold more electric charge at one time, while staying relatively small in size.

awardsResolved.name: Energy Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Stores a significant amount of energy. Best used with intermittent power sources like Solar Panels to create an energy buffer.

gui/menu/research/name/orbital_scanning.name: Orbital Scanning
gui/menu/research/name/orbital_scanning.description: Contains blueprints for an Orbital Scanner which allows the Riftbreaker to detect areas of interest on the entire planet. It is used to plan missions beyond the initial landing site.

awardsResolved.name: Orbital Scanner
awardsResolved.desc: Constantly scans the whole planet to detect valuable resources, artifacts, new species and other phenomena outside the main base area. Allows rift jumping to planetary missions.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_heavy_arti.name: Heavy Artillery Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/towers_heavy_arti.description: Extreme variants of the defensive towers. Heavy Artillery uses plasma jets to propel a shell with nuclear payload while the Mine Layer Tower uses automated mine drones to block incoming enemy waves.

awardsResolved.name: Heavy Artillery Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots mini nuke explosive shells at very long distances. Can protect the base from enemies shooting from a long distance. Use with Radars to shoot farther than its viewing range.

awardsResolved.name: Mine Layer Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Spawns mines in the area of operation which in time create a mine field that is very hard for enemies to go through.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_ammunition_.name: Tower Ammunition Handling - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/tower_ammunition_.description: Blueprints for buildings that produce ammunition for defensive towers. Separate production lines for Mecha-Suit and tower ammo removes any potential bottlenecks in ammunition delivery. Comes with specialized, secure ammunition storage bunkers.

awardsResolved.name: Ammo Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Automatically gathers and stores ammunition. It expands the global storage space for all ammunition.

awardsResolved.name: Tower Ammo Factory
awardsResolved.desc: Produces ammunition for Defense Towers.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_artillery_.name: Artillery Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/towers_artillery_.description: These defensive towers are meant to combat ranged attackers by firing an explosive shell over a long distance. Extremely effective in conjunction with radars.

awardsResolved.name: Artillery Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots explosive shells at long distances. Very effective against groups of enemies. Can shoot farther than its viewing range. Requires a Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Rocket Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots explosive rockets at the enemies. Best used against groups of enemies or creatures that are vulnerable to area damage.

gui/menu/research/name/gas_energy_lvl1.name: Gas Energy - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/gas_energy_lvl1.description: Thanks to this technology it is possible to generate electricity using any form of natural, flammable gas. The gas can be extracted from all forms of decaying organic matter, making Gas Power Plants versatile.

awardsResolved.name: Gas Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Produces a significant amount of energy but requires Flammable Gas to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Bio Composter
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Flammable Gas out of Plant Biomass.

awardsResolved.name: Gas Filtering Plant
awardsResolved.desc: Refines Sludge to produce Flammable Gas which is used as fuel by the Gas Powerplants. Requires a constant flow of sludge that can be connected by using pipelines.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Liquid Resources Handling - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: This technology contains schematics for structures and devices used in handling liquids on an industrial scale. These buildings are universal and easily adapt to any type of liquid.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Material Storage
awardsResolved.desc: Stores a significant amount of liquid or gas. Can store only one type of resource at a time and needs to be connected with Pipelines to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Pump
awardsResolved.desc: Pumps liquid resources from pools found around the planet. Pumps can not operate too close to each other.

awardsResolved.name: Pipe Junction
awardsResolved.desc: This structure allows the Riftbreaker to cross two pipelines that transport different types of liquid resources without mixing them up.

awardsResolved.name: Pipeline
awardsResolved.desc: Transports liquids, gasses and plasma. Used to connect various buildings that require a fuel source to operate. Can transport and store only one type or resource at a time.

awardsResolved.name: Water Filtering Plant
awardsResolved.desc: Purifies contaminated fluids like mud and produces clean water. Requires Energy to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/defensive_buildin.name: Defensive Buildings - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/defensive_buildin.description: A set of upgrades for all defensive structures in the Riftbreaker base. These buildings are much more durable than their predecessors.

awardsResolved.name: AI Hub
awardsResolved.desc: Provides AI Cores that are required to manage more buildings with artificial intelligence like Sentinel Towers or the Repair Facility.

awardsResolved.name: Wall Gate
awardsResolved.desc: Opens automatically when the Mecha-Suit is in close proximity. Doesn't require Energy to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Heightened Wall Floor
awardsResolved.desc: Provides a higher defense position for the Mecha-Suit allowing it to shoot above walls and defend the base from inside of the walls.

gui/menu/research/name/nuclear_energy_lv.name: Nuclear Energy - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/nuclear_energy_lv.description: This package contains blueprints necessary to set up Nuclear Power Plants in the Riftbreaker base. It utilizes fuel rods made from enriched uranium and requires supply of some form of liquid coolant. High energy output.

awardsResolved.name: Nuclear Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: It has very large Energy output. Requires Uranium to operate.

awardsResolved.name: Uranium Centrifuge
awardsResolved.desc: Refines Uranium Ore. Produces Uranium for use in powerplants and crafting.

gui/menu/research/name/alien_research.name: Alien Research
gui/menu/research/name/alien_research.description: Unlocks the alien research tree and grants access to the field Laboratory building. The Laboratory analyzes samples of alien flora, fauna and minerals while the bio scanner allows to obtain those samples more efficiently.

awardsResolved.name: Laboratory
awardsResolved.desc: Provides advanced research facilities that are required to develop technologies based on extreaterrestrial fauna and flora.

gui/menu/research/name/magnetic_stabiliz.name: Magnetic Stabilizer
gui/menu/research/name/magnetic_stabiliz.description: Magnetic Stabilizers that are included with this technology are necessary to open the long-range portal in the Rift Station. The Stabilizer negates the irregularities in the electromagnetic field with the use of the nuclear antigravity node.

awardsResolved.name: Rift Magnetic Stabilizer
awardsResolved.desc: Stabilizes the big rift portal. Needs Water or Supercoolant to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/rare_element_mini.name: Rare Element Mining - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/rare_element_mini.description: Upgrade blueprints for Rare Element Mines. Improved drilling mechanism and refined screening algorithm give a better yield of the final product.

awardsResolved.name: Rare Element Mine
awardsResolved.desc: Mines rare resources like Uranium, Titanium and Palladium. Must be placed on an ore deposit and powered with Energy to operate.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Cobalt Handling
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: This technology adapts the Riftbreaker storage and handling algorithms, making collection and use of cobalt possible. It also contains blueprints for a universal Geoscanner that is used for seeking out underground anomalies, such as cobalt deposits.

gui/menu/research/name/liquid_compressio.name: Liquids' Compression - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/liquid_compressio.description: This technology allows The Riftbreaker to construct Liquid Compressors and Decompressors. These facilities provide the Riftbreaker with the ability to package and transport liquids to any place within the range of the Rift network.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Compressor
awardsResolved.desc: This facility is used to compress liquid resources on a subatomic level to allow their transportation over long distances using the Rift Technology.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Decompressor
awardsResolved.desc: The reception terminal for liquids transported using the Rift Technology. This facility restores the liquids treated by the Liquid Compressor to their original form.

gui/menu/research/name/liquid_compressio.name: Liquids' Compression - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/liquid_compressio.description: The improved volumetric accelerator in this version of the blueprint allows the Riftbreaker to transfer more liquids in a much more efficient manner, increasing both the input and the output capacity of this technology.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Compressor
awardsResolved.desc: This facility is used to compress liquid resources on a subatomic level to allow their transportation over long distances using the Rift Technology.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Decompressor
awardsResolved.desc: The reception terminal for liquids transported using the Rift Technology. This facility restores the liquids treated by the Liquid Compressor to their original form.

gui/menu/research/name/liquid_compressio.name: Liquids' Compression - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/liquid_compressio.description: The improved volumetric accelerator in this version of the blueprint allows the Riftbreaker to transfer more liquids in a much more efficient manner, increasing both the input and the output capacity of this technology.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Compressor
awardsResolved.desc: This facility is used to compress liquid resources on a subatomic level to allow their transportation over long distances using the Rift Technology.

awardsResolved.name: Liquid Decompressor
awardsResolved.desc: The reception terminal for liquids transported using the Rift Technology. This facility restores the liquids treated by the Liquid Compressor to their original form.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_lightning_l.name: Lightning Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/tower_lightning_l.description: This research will allow the Riftbreaker to construct Lightning Towers. These towers quickly drain all the free electrons from their surroundings and direct a targeted electric arc that delivers a high-voltage shock to the enemy.

awardsResolved.name: Lightning Tower
awardsResolved.desc: The weaponized electromagnet embedded within this tower creates an enormous disparity between itself and all organic matter around it. Thanks to that, it can create a powerful, but controllable electric arc that can affect multiple attackers.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_lightning_l.name: Lightning Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/tower_lightning_l.description: Increased capacitor size allows this version of the Lightning Tower to store more charge, allowing it to discharge an even stronger electric arc that has the potential of reaching a wider range of targets.

awardsResolved.name: Lightning Tower
awardsResolved.desc: The weaponized electromagnet embedded within this tower creates an enormous disparity between itself and all organic matter around it. Thanks to that, it can create a powerful, but controllable electric arc that can affect multiple attackers.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_lightning_l.name: Lightning Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/tower_lightning_l.description: Increased capacitor size allows this version of the Lightning Tower to store more charge, allowing it to discharge an even stronger electric arc that has the potential of reaching a wider range of targets.

awardsResolved.name: Lightning Tower
awardsResolved.desc: The weaponized electromagnet embedded within this tower creates an enormous disparity between itself and all organic matter around it. Thanks to that, it can create a powerful, but controllable electric arc that can affect multiple attackers.

gui/menu/research/name/energy_pylon_lvl1.name: Energy Relay System
gui/menu/research/name/energy_pylon_lvl1.description: Highly advanced technology allowing for the transfer of energy over long distances without the need for physical connections. Instantaneously transfers energy between the pylons and can effectively connect separate energy grids.

awardsResolved.name: Energy Pylon
awardsResolved.desc: The Energy Relay system allows the Riftbreaker to transfer energy over long distances without the use of Energy Connectors. At least two pylons are necessary for this technology to work properly.

gui/menu/research/name/drone_mine_lvl2.name: Automated Resource Gathering - Level 2
gui/menu/research/name/drone_mine_lvl2.description: The upgraded technology utilizes cutting-edge quantum computing and AI. Equipped with advanced algorithms and predictive analytics, the upgraded system delivers unparalleled efficiency.

awardsResolved.name: Drone Mine
awardsResolved.desc: The Drone Mine is a hub for a fleet of automated drones that will collect solid resources of all varieties within the operating radius of the Mine.

awardsResolved.name: Loot Collector
awardsResolved.desc: The Loot Collector Tower is a hub for automated drones that will scavenge all the resources and materials dropped within the tower's area of operation.

gui/menu/research/name/drone_mine_lvl3.name: Automated Resource Gathering - Level 3
gui/menu/research/name/drone_mine_lvl3.description: The upgraded technology utilizes cutting-edge quantum computing and AI. Equipped with advanced algorithms and predictive analytics, the upgraded system delivers unparalleled efficiency.

awardsResolved.name: Drone Mine
awardsResolved.desc: The Drone Mine is a hub for a fleet of automated drones that will collect solid resources of all varieties within the operating radius of the Mine.

awardsResolved.name: Loot Collector
awardsResolved.desc: The Loot Collector Tower is a hub for automated drones that will scavenge all the resources and materials dropped within the tower's area of operation.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_portal_lvl1.name: Portal Bomb Towers - Level 1
gui/menu/research/name/tower_portal_lvl1.description: Through the utilization of portal technology, this defense structure deploys a specialized explosive, targeted at distant enemy hostiles. With instantaneous delivery of the payload, this weapon system offers an unprecedented advantage over traditional artillery.

awardsResolved.name: Portal Bomb Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Using a short-range Rift Portal, this defensive tower will deliver an armed warhead, prioritizing long-range hostile units. Thanks to instant delivery of the payload, this tower circumvents the problems connected with conventional artillery use.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_portal_lvl2.name: Portal Bomb Towers - Level 2
gui/menu/research/name/tower_portal_lvl2.description: The advanced version of the Portal Bomb Tower employs a quantum destabilizer module to enhance the destructive potential of its warheads.

awardsResolved.name: Portal Bomb Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Using a short-range Rift Portal, this defensive tower will deliver an armed warhead, prioritizing long-range hostile units. Thanks to instant delivery of the payload, this tower circumvents the problems connected with conventional artillery use.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_portal_lvl3.name: Portal Bomb Towers - Level 3
gui/menu/research/name/tower_portal_lvl3.description: The advanced version of the Portal Bomb Tower employs a quantum destabilizer module to enhance the destructive potential of its warheads.

awardsResolved.name: Portal Bomb Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Using a short-range Rift Portal, this defensive tower will deliver an armed warhead, prioritizing long-range hostile units. Thanks to instant delivery of the payload, this tower circumvents the problems connected with conventional artillery use.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_acid_spitte.name: Acid Spewer Towers - Level 1
gui/menu/research/name/tower_acid_spitte.description: Formidable defensive structure that spews concentrated hydrofluoric acid onto the ground, creating a pool damaging enemy forces. With a rapid-fire mechanism, this tower can saturate entire areas with acid.

awardsResolved.name: Acid Spitter Tower
awardsResolved.desc: This defensive tower covers the ground with highly concentrated hydrofuoric acid. The acid will damage any organic matter that comes into contact with it.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_acid_spitte.name: Acid Spewer Towers - Level 2
gui/menu/research/name/tower_acid_spitte.description: The upgraded version of the Acid Spewer Tower features a cutting-edge design that utilizes advanced nanomaterials to increase the range and damage of the acid projectiles.

awardsResolved.name: Acid Spitter Tower
awardsResolved.desc: This defensive tower covers the ground with highly concentrated hydrofuoric acid. The acid will damage any organic matter that comes into contact with it.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_acid_spitte.name: Acid Spewer Towers - Level 3
gui/menu/research/name/tower_acid_spitte.description: The upgraded version of the Acid Spewer Tower features a cutting-edge design that utilizes advanced nanomaterials to increase the range and damage of the acid projectiles.

awardsResolved.name: Acid Spitter Tower
awardsResolved.desc: This defensive tower covers the ground with highly concentrated hydrofuoric acid. The acid will damage any organic matter that comes into contact with it.

gui/menu/research/name/trap_fire_lvl1.name: Fire Traps - Level 1
gui/menu/research/name/trap_fire_lvl1.description: The Fire Trap detects enemy presence and disseminates a nanogel mixture, resulting in a conflagration capable of inflicting significant harm on any living organisms in its vicinity.

awardsResolved.name: Trap - Fire
awardsResolved.desc: Upon activation by a hostile creature, this trap sprays napalm all over the surrounding area, causing organic matter to catch fire and take fire damage. Can only be activated a limited number of times before it needs to be replaced.

gui/menu/research/name/trap_fire_lvl2.name: Fire Traps - Level 2
gui/menu/research/name/trap_fire_lvl2.description: Through the use of advanced pyrotechnic compounds, this improved Fire Trap can now create a much larger and more intense fire, dealing significantly more damage to hostile entities that trigger it.

gui/menu/research/name/trap_fire_lvl3.name: Fire Traps - Level 3
gui/menu/research/name/trap_fire_lvl3.description: Through the use of advanced pyrotechnic compounds, this improved Fire Trap can now create a much larger and more intense fire, dealing significantly more damage to hostile entities that trigger it.

gui/menu/research/name/drone_mine_lvl1.name: Automated Resource Gathering - Level 1
gui/menu/research/name/drone_mine_lvl1.description: This technology is a revolutionary development in resource collection, allowing to construct buildings with specialized drones that autonomously collect resources of all kinds within their radius of operation.

awardsResolved.name: Drone Mine
awardsResolved.desc: The Drone Mine is a hub for a fleet of automated drones that will collect solid resources of all varieties within the operating radius of the Mine.

awardsResolved.name: Loot Collector
awardsResolved.desc: The Loot Collector Tower is a hub for automated drones that will scavenge all the resources and materials dropped within the tower's area of operation.

gui/menu/research/name/gas_extractor_lvl.name: Gas Extractor - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/gas_extractor_lvl.description: The Gas Extractor is a specialized structure designed to harness flammable gas from natural gas vents scattered across the terrain. Through advanced filtration and extraction processes, it converts the raw gas into a usable energy source, suitable for powering various base operations and equipment. This essential facility ensures sustainable energy production and resource utilization in remote and inhospitable environments.

awardsResolved.name: Gas Extractor
awardsResolved.desc: Place this structure on top of a Gas Vent to extinguish it and start collecting the Flammable Gas escaping from beneath the ground.

gui/menu/research/name/gas_extractor_lvl.name: Gas Extractor - lvl. 2

gui/menu/research/name/skill_shockwave_b.name: Shockwave Blast - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/skill_shockwave_b.description: This program overloads the core of the gluon field fusion reactor at the heart of the Mecha-Suit. The increas of the core activity generates a lot of energy that needs to be released in the form of a shockwave and a small explosion.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_ener.name: Energy Weapons - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_ener.description: Researching this technology will allow the Armory to manufacture portable energy cells that can be utilized as ammunition for energy based weapons. Basic weapon blueprints are included.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_expl.name: Explosive Weapons - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_expl.description: Gives the Armory the ability to produce explosive ammunition that can be used in a wide range of weapons. Grants the user the ability to craft basic weapons utilizing explosive ammo.

awardsResolved.name: Rocket Launcher
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Can load up to five times more missiles at once. Bigger damage.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_mini.name: Minigun - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_mini.description: This weapon blueprint serves as a base for crafting a belt-driven, six-barrel minigun with significant firepower. It utilizes small-caliber ammo, making it relatively cheap in use, while the insanely high fire rate ensures relevance on the battlefield.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_grenad.name: Grenade - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_grenad.description: The most basic, explosive weapon. It's single use and deals explosive damage in its blast radius. Explodes on hitting the target or after the fuse runs out.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_basic_weapon.name: Basic Weapons
gui/menu/research/name/mech_basic_weapon.description: A set of blueprints that give the Riftbreaker the means to craft the most basic melee weapons, as well as firearms. They are adequatly strong by Earth's standards, but might prove to be too weak as the mission progresses.

awardsResolved.name: Blaster
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Accumulating blaster energy results in a powerful plasma blast that destroys targets in a wide radius.

awardsResolved.name: Shotgun
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Longer range and narrow spread. Bigger damage and penetration power.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_swor.name: Sword - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_swor.description: Reworked sword used high quality alloys which significantly improve its battle parameters. Increased damage, range and ability to mod are not something to think about if you can afford to craft it.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_shockwave_b.name: Shockwave Blast - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/skill_shockwave_b.description: This upgrade increases the nominal frequency of the fusion core. As a result, when the core is put into overdrive, the resulting shockwave is more devastationg.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_high.name: High Caliber Weapons - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_high.description: An upgrade to the High Caliber Weapons technology, allowing Riftbreakers to craft more powerful weapons with more room for modifications.

awardsResolved.name: Burst Rifle
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Two times more projectiles in a burst with a bigger damage and penetration power.

awardsResolved.name: Shotgun
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Longer range and narrow spread. Bigger damage and penetration power.

awardsResolved.name: High Caliber Rifle
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Adds small splash damage to every hit. Bigger damage and penetration power.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_mini.name: Minigun - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_mini.description: An upgraded blueprint for Minigun construction. Minigun crafted from this blueprint has much greater properties than its predecessor and offers room for modifications.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_high.name: High Caliber Weapons - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_high.description: Contains instructions on manufacturing methods of high caliber ammunition that is used in powerful conventional firearms. Gives the Riftbreaker the ability to craft some new weapon models.

awardsResolved.name: Burst Rifle
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Two times more projectiles in a burst with a bigger damage and penetration power.

awardsResolved.name: High Caliber Rifle
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Adds small splash damage to every hit. Bigger damage and penetration power.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_upgrade_armo.name: Mech Armor - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_upgrade_armo.description: These modules can be installed in one of the Mecha-Suit upgrade slots. They contain instructions and programs that alter the Mecha-Suits behavior and abilities. These modules all have unique properties and can be used interchangeably with each other.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_basic_upgrad.name: Basic Upgrades
gui/menu/research/name/mech_basic_upgrad.description: These modules can be installed in one of the Mecha-Suit upgrade slots. They contain instructions and programs that alter the Mecha-Suits behavior and abilities. These modules all have unique properties and can be used interchangeably with each other.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_basic_skills.name: Basic Skills
gui/menu/research/name/mech_basic_skills.description: A collection of the most basic programs for the Mecha-Suit. These basic abilities are meant to help the pilot with controlling the Mech by automating some of the most commonly used functions.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_hamm.name: Hammer - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_hamm.description: Blueprints for crafting a basic battle hammer for the Mecha-Suit. It requires no ammo to use and creates a powerful shockwave upon impact, dealing area damage in a radius. Relatively slow but packs quite a punch.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_spea.name: Spear - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_spea.description: A spear in the hands of a skilled warrior is something to be feared especially if he is a 4,5 meter tall exoskeleton. This weapon is capable of piercing multiple targets at a medium range and additionally to that dealts cryo damage slowing them down.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_powe.name: Power Fist - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_powe.description: Improved version of the Power Fist blueprints use very high quality alloys for crafting which increase damage and all other relevant battle parameters. Increased size leaves room for modding.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_hamm.name: Hammer - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_hamm.description: Blueprints for enhanced version of the battle hammer for the Mecha-Suit. More advanced materials used for crafting result in much better capabilities. Moddable.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_spea.name: Spear - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_spea.description: Redesigned version of the Spear increases its size and allows modding. Better materials improve battle parameters making it more deadly.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_powe.name: Power Fist - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_powe.description: Improved version of the Power Fist blueprints use very high quality alloys for crafting which increase damage and all other relevant battle parameters. Increased size leaves room for modding.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_hamm.name: Hammer - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_hamm.description: Blueprints for enhanced version of the battle hammer for the Mecha-Suit. More advanced materials used for crafting result in much better capabilities. Moddable.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_spea.name: Spear - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_spea.description: Redesigned version of the Spear increases its size and allows modding. Better materials improve battle parameters making it more deadly.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_powe.name: Power Fist - Extreme
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_powe.description: Improved version of the Power Fist blueprints use very high quality alloys for crafting which increase damage and all other relevant battle parameters. Increased size leaves room for modding.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_hamm.name: Hammer - Extreme

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_spea.name: Spear - Extreme
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_spea.description: Redesigned version of the Spear increases its size and allows modding. Better materials improve battle parameters making it more deadly.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_heav.name: Heavy Plasma - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_heav.description: This research contains blueprints for a Heavy Plasma Cannon - a formidable, energy-based weapon that can double as a portable projectile shield for the Mecha-Suit.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_heav.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

awardsResolved.name: Heavy Plasma
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Forms a plasma barrier in front of the user, protecting them from all incoming projectiles.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_heav.name: Heavy Plasma - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_heav.description: The addition of a reinforced ion propulsor to this version of the Heavy Plasma Cannon results in a much higher energy yield for each shot, resulting in a significant increase in the damage output. Can be modified further.

awardsResolved.name: Heavy Plasma

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_lase.name: Laser Sword - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_lase.description: The scientific advancements made during the mission on Galatea 37, coupled with the specialized resources found on that planet resulted in the creation of the blueprints for this fine weapon.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_lase.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_lase.name: Laser Sword - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_lase.description: A more elegant design, utilizing a more powerful photon emitter contained by an antigravitron field. The blade of this sword burns much hotter, thus dealing more damage, and making room for modifications.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_lase.name: Laser Sword - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_lase.description: A more elegant design, utilizing a more powerful photon emitter contained by an antigravitron field. The blade of this sword burns much hotter, thus dealing more damage, and making room for modifications.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_scanne.name: Sentry Bioscanner - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_scanne.description: This miniature scanning station uses multiple highly specialized sensors to scan all interesting objects in its area of operation. All research results are uploaded directly to the Laboratory and fed to The Riftbreaker Database.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_scanne.name: Sentry Bioscanner - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_scanne.description: More advanced sensors packed into this version of the Bioscanner Turret allow it to operate longer, scan interesting objects faster, and on a much bigger radius. This results in an increased amount of data fed into the Database.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_scanne.name: Sentry Bioscanner - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_scanne.description: More advanced sensors packed into this version of the Bioscanner Turret allow it to operate longer, scan interesting objects faster, and on a much bigger radius. This results in an increased amount of data fed into the Database.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_orbital_las.name: Orbital Laser - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/skill_orbital_las.description: This targeting module lets Mr. Riggs set an initial strike point for a powerful Orbital Laser. The laser will then slowly travel along the ground away from Mr. Riggs.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_orbital_las.name: Orbital Laser - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/skill_orbital_las.description: An upgraded laser emitter provides a more concentrated burst of energy, resulting in much higher damage. This weapon can be used to pave the way through even the toughest of enemies.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_orbital_las.name: Orbital Laser - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/skill_orbital_las.description: An upgraded laser emitter provides a more concentrated burst of energy, resulting in much higher damage. This weapon can be used to pave the way through even the toughest of enemies.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_sonic_.name: Sonic Grenades - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_sonic_.description: Sonic Grenades are not as destructive as their standard counterparts, but provide an extended area of effect. High frequency sound waves generated by Sonic Grenades are harmful to most creatures.
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_sonic_.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_sonic_.name: Sonic Grenades - Extreme
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_sonic_.description: The refined housing of the device results in less energy loss during the initial blast phase. Thanks to that, the sonic waves are undisturbed and can travel for longer before they dissipate.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_boun.description: The Bouncing Blades is a highly versatile and deadly weapon that launches razor-sharp spinning blades that can ricochet off walls and other obstacles, allowing for precision targeting and maximum damage potential.

awardsResolved.name: Bouncing Blades
awardsResolved.desc: Charged Attack: The weapon releases several spinning blades in a wider cone.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_boun.description: The upgraded Bouncing Blades have been coated with a hyper-durable, self-replicating nanomaterial that continually repairs and sharpens the blades, ensuring maximum damage potential even after multiple bounces.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_pick.name: Pickaxe - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_pick.description: Versatile melee weapon that deals damage upon impact and sends a powerful shockwave rippling through the ground. Its shockwave can take out multiple enemies at once or break through obstacles.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_pick.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_pick.name: Pickaxe - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_pick.description: By incorporating a novel kinetic energy converter, the upgraded Pickaxe, inflicts more damage to enemies in its path and covers a wider area.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_crys.name: Shard Gun - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_crys.description: Similar to a machine gun in its rapid-fire capabilities, the Shard Gun fires crystal shards that split and ricochet off surfaces upon impact, creating a deadly spray of shrapnel that can take out multiple targets at once.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_crys.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_crys.name: Shard Gun - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_crys.description: With a faster rate of fire and improved accuracy, the upgraded Shard Gun is a great tool for fighting groups of creatures. Allows for pinpoint accuracy, while its cutting-edge crystal technology ensures maximum penetration and damage.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_crys.name: Shard Gun - Superior
