gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_soni.name: Sonic Fist - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_soni.description: With lower rate of attack than Power Fists, they make up for it with the ability to unleash a focused shockwave damaging enemies within a short range. These qualities make Sonic Fists an effective choice for taking down numerous opponents.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_soni.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_soni.name: Sonic Fist - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_soni.description: Using cutting-edge energy manipulation, the upgraded Sonic Fists provide an immense increase in firepower. Sophisticated sonic amplifiers create powerful shockwaves with each strike, capable of dealing immense damage.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_flamewave_s.description: The Flame Wave module is an advanced skill upgrade for the Mecha-Suit that enables it to project a cone-shaped wave of flammable chemicals. This fiery blast can deal significant damage to enemies caught in its path.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_flamewave_a.name: Flame Wave - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/skill_flamewave_a.description: The upgraded Flame Wave skill module utilizes a patented thermo-oscillatory technology, which superheats the chemicals before expulsion. The resulting explosion is significantly more powerful.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_trid.name: Trident - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_trid.description: The Trident is a versatile melee weapon designed to extend during attacks, striking multiple enemies simultaneously. When swung, it extends and deals damage in three directions, making it perfect for crowd control and close-quarters combat.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_trid.name: Trident - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_trid.description: An advanced upgrade of the original Trident, designed to deliver even greater versatility and power in melee combat. It extends further during attacks and deals increased damage thanks to the use of more refined materials.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_trid.name: Trident - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_trid.description: An advanced upgrade of the original Trident, designed to deliver even greater versatility and power in melee combat. It extends further during attacks and deals increased damage thanks to the use of more refined materials.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_trid.name: Trident - Extreme
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_trid.description: An advanced upgrade of the original Trident, designed to deliver even greater versatility and power in melee combat. It extends further during attacks and deals increased damage thanks to the use of more refined materials.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_drone_.name: Drone Swarm - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_drone_.description: This consumable item deploys four autonomous drones that provide various support functions for a limited duration. Whether it's engaging enemies, gathering resources, or repairing critical structures, these versatile drones adapt to the immediate needs of the battlefield. Once activated, the Drone Swarm operates independently, allowing the player to focus on strategic objectives while benefiting from enhanced operational support.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_drone_.name: Drone Swarm - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_drone_.description: This upgraded version not only increases the drones' operational efficiency but also expands their functional versatility. With improved combat systems, faster resource collection, and superior repair protocols, the Drone Swarm ensures comprehensive assistance even in the most challenging scenarios.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_drone_.name: Drone Swarm - Superior

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_mortar.name: Sentry Mortar - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_mortar.description: The Mortar Sentry is a deployable turret that provides formidable indirect fire support for a limited time. Once activated, it autonomously targets and bombards enemy positions with high-explosive mortar rounds. Designed for rapid deployment and ease of use, the Mortar Sentry does not require additional ammunition or power sources, making it a highly effective tool for turning the tide in intense combat scenarios.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_mortar.name: Sentry Mortar - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_mortar.description: This advanced deployable turret features improved targeting accuracy, increased rate of fire, and enhanced explosive rounds, ensuring maximum battlefield impact. It remains self-sufficient, requiring no external ammo or power sources, and delivers exceptional indirect fire support for a prolonged period.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_mortar.name: Sentry Mortar - Superior

gui/menu/research/name/towers_shockwave_.description: An experimental defensive tower that does not use any kind of ammunition. Instead, it uses a massive mallet, propelled by electro-plasma thrusters to strike the ground and create a shockwave.

awardsResolved.name: Shockwave Tower

gui/menu/research/name/alien_flora_culti.description: Allows the Riftbreaker to build Cultivators and Harvesting Stations. These drone operated buildings are used to grow and cultivate saplings of species of local flora. They can be collected for biomass or other resources.

awardsResolved.name: Harvesting Station
awardsResolved.desc: Sends out automatic drones that gather alien flora in a radius around the building. This process generates all kinds of resources depending on what was gathered.

awardsResolved.name: Cultivator
awardsResolved.desc: This plant plants plants :)

gui/menu/research/name/supercooling.name: Super Cooling - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/supercooling.description: Thanks to the discoveries made on the Magma Biome it is possible to try and replicate the cooling properties of some of Galatean plants. The resulting substance would be a much more efficient coolant than regular water.

awardsResolved.name: Supercoolant Refinery
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Supercoolant resource for advanced buildings.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_laser_lvl1.description: The principle is the same as in the case of the portable Laser weapon - en emitter produces electromagnetic waves that are later amplified and directed one way in a single beam. The tower is not limited by ammunition, however, making it more powerful.

awardsResolved.name: Laser Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots a constant beam of energy at a target. The beam gets more powerful while constantly hitting the target so its best used against large and heavily armored units.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Tanzanite Handling
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: The properties of Tanzanite suggest that it could be used to improve some of the Riftbreaker equipment and technologies. This research will develop Tanzanite handling methods and discover potential uses for it.

awardsResolved.name: Ionizer
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Plasma out of other resources.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Ferdonite Handling
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: The properties of Ferdonite suggest that it could be used to improve some of the Riftbreaker equipment and technologies. This research will develop Ferdonite handling methods and discover potential uses for it.

gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.name: Environmental Shielding - Heat
gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.description: This technology protects the Mecha-Suit from the damage caused by the intense heat in the Volcanic Zone. This is a passive upgrade (does not require crafting).

gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.name: Environmental Shielding - Sun
gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.description: Adds a layer of highly reflective coating on the surface of all structures in the base. Thanks to that the equipment and structures in the base are protected from taking damage due to intense solar radiation. This is a passive upgrade (does not require crafting).
gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/alien_research_lv.name: Alien Research - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/alien_research_lv.description: First level of alien research tree that leads to discovery of new technologies based on alien flora and fauna.

gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.name: Environmental Shielding - Acid
gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.description: This technology protects the Mecha-Suit and the Riftbreaker buildings from the corrosive damage caused by strongly acidic environments. This is a passive upgrade (does not require crafting).
gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_upgrade_fusi.name: Mech Fusion Core - Superior

gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.name: Environmental Shielding - Radiation
gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.description: Adds a layer of lightweight, radiation absorbing metal that protects the Riftbreaker and their delicate equipment from the adverse effects of ionizing radiation. This is a passive upgrade (does not require crafting).
gui/menu/research/name/environmental_shi.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_teleport.name: Teleport
gui/menu/research/name/skill_teleport.description: The aim of this research is to replicate the very short range jumps through the Rift field that some Galatean creatures seem to be able to do. These jumps are easily controllable and do not require any additional setup.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_upgrade_soni.name: Mech Sonic Sensors - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_upgrade_soni.description: These modules can be installed in one of the Mecha-Suit upgrade slots. They contain instructions and programs that alter the Mecha-Suits behavior and abilities. These modules all have unique properties and can be used interchangeably with each other.

gui/menu/research/name/magma_energy_lvl2.description: Sturdier internal structure of the pipelines, as well as improved flow regulators for the Magma Power Plant. Installing this upgrade will result in a much higher energy yield.

awardsResolved.name: Magma Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Uses liquid Magma to produce large amounts of Energy. Needs to be connected to liquid Magma with Pipelines.

gui/menu/research/name/magma_energy_lvl1.name: Magma Energy - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/magma_energy_lvl1.description: Researching this technology will allow the Riftbreaker to use magma in powerplants designed especially for this purpose. It provides an abundant source of energy in places where magma pools are accesible.

awardsResolved.name: Magma Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Uses liquid Magma to produce large amounts of Energy. Needs to be connected to liquid Magma with Pipelines.

gui/menu/research/name/alien_research_lv.name: Alien Research - lvl. 4

awardsResolved.name: Laboratory

gui/menu/research/name/skill_timewarp.name: Time Manipulation
gui/menu/research/name/skill_timewarp.description: With the technology acquired through this research it should be possible to create a minature warp in timespace around the Mecha-Suit. It would allow the user to manipulate timespace to a degree, slowing down the surroundings for a short time.

gui/menu/research/name/floor_acid.name: Anticorrosive Floor
gui/menu/research/name/floor_acid.description: This research allows the Riftbreaker to build a special floor variant that is imprevious to all kinds of organic and inorganic acids.
gui/menu/research/name/floor_acid.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/floor_desert.name: Extra Stable Floor
gui/menu/research/name/floor_desert.description: This floor variant stabilizes the ground beneath, making it a perfect foundation if a Riftbreaker wants to build something on loose ground, for example a pit of quicksand. Nanotubes extend far below the actual floor level to give the entire structure support.
gui/menu/research/name/floor_desert.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/magma_energy_lvl3.name: Magma Energy - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/magma_energy_lvl3.description: Sturdier internal structure of the pipelines, as well as improved flow regulators for the Magma Power Plant. Installing this upgrade will result in a much higher energy yield.

awardsResolved.name: Magma Powerplant
awardsResolved.desc: Uses liquid Magma to produce large amounts of Energy. Needs to be connected to liquid Magma with Pipelines.

gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.name: Hazenite Handling
gui/menu/research/name/resource_handling.description: The properties of Hazenite suggest that it could be used to improve some of the Riftbreaker equipment and technologies. This research will develop Hazenite handling methods and discover potential uses for it.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_railgun_lv.name: Railgun Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/towers_railgun_lv.description: A more powerful version of the Railgun Tower with room for installing additional modifications.

awardsResolved.name: Railgun Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Shoots a really powerful, piercing energy beam. Very low fire rate. Each shot consumes a significant portion of Energy from the main energy supply.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_mini.name: Mini Nuke Launcher - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_mini.description: A portable launcher of rockets with a minor nuclear warhead. Requires a lot of explosive ammunition and has a significant cooldown period, but it's a blast. Literally.

gui/menu/research/name/magnetic_stabiliz.name: Solid State Magnetic Stabilizer
gui/menu/research/name/magnetic_stabiliz.description: A different approach to the problem of stabilizing the Rift Station Portal. This building emulates the behavioral properties of magnetic boulders with the use of large amounts of rare resources, but eliminating the need for cooling altogether.

awardsResolved.name: Advanced Magnetic Stabilizer
awardsResolved.desc: Stabilizes the big rift portal with alien based tech. More advanced than standard version. Does not need cooling.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_rail.name: Railgun - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_rail.description: More advanced version of the Railgun with better properties, easier handling and room for more upgrades.

awardsResolved.name: Railgun
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Shoots up to three times more beams. Bigger damage.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_rail.name: Railgun - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_rail.description: More advanced version of the Railgun with better properties, easier handling and room for more upgrades.

awardsResolved.name: Railgun
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Shoots up to three times more beams. Bigger damage.

awardsResolved.name: Railgun
awardsResolved.desc: Charged attack: Shoots up to three times more beams. Bigger damage.

gui/menu/research/name/cryo_technology.name: Cryo Technology
gui/menu/research/name/cryo_technology.description: Researching this technology will allow the Riftbreaker to develop a facility that will bring down the local ambient temperature in the Magma Biome. This will open up the possibility of setting up a permanent outpost in that biome.
gui/menu/research/name/cryo_technology.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

awardsResolved.name: Cryo Station
awardsResolved.desc: A self-powered rapid environment cooling station. This building can be placed to quickly reduce the temperature in very hot environments to enable other structures to be built.

gui/menu/research/name/research_station.name: Research Station
gui/menu/research/name/research_station.description: The Research Station is a self-powered, standalone laboratory. It is used to conduct experiments on objects of interest that cannot be sampled any other way.

awardsResolved.name: Research Station
awardsResolved.desc: This building contains a robust set of sensors and analysis facilities. It is used to gather research data from objects or anomalies that are too complicated to be scanned by Mr. Rigg's field equipment.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_corr.name: Corrosive Gun - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_corr.description: This weapon uses small portions of a sticky substance containing fluoroantimonic acid as its projectiles. The acid deals damage on impact and leaves behind a pool of acid on the ground. Additionally, the Corrosive Gun can help the Riftbreaker remove large objects by dissolving them.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_corr.name: Corrosive Gun - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_corr.description: A set of upgrades for the Corrosive Gun, increasing its effectiveness on the battlefield. Improved formula contains a higher concentration of fluoroantimonic acid, which results in a much faster burn rate in contact with organic matter. Additional room for modifications available.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_corr.name: Corrosive Gun - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_corr.description: A set of upgrades for the Corrosive Gun, increasing its effectiveness on the battlefield. Improved formula contains a higher concentration of fluoroantimonic acid, which results in a much faster burn rate in contact with organic matter. Additional room for modifications available.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_corr.name: Corrosive Gun - Extreme
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_corr.description: A set of upgrades for the Corrosive Gun, increasing its effectiveness on the battlefield. Improved formula contains a higher concentration of fluoroantimonic acid, which results in a much faster burn rate in contact with organic matter. Additional room for modifications available.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.name: Cryogenic Atomizer - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.description: Short range, fluid based weapon that instantly cools down the surrounding area, dealing damage to organic matter and slowing down movement of the target. This effect has been made possible by the extensive research of the Volcanic Area of Galatea 37 and its unique Cryogenic Plants.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.name: Cryogenic Atomizer - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.description: Blueprints for an improved version of the Cryogenic Atomizer. Redesigned nozzle and more concentrated fuel formula significantly increase the freezing properties of this weapon. These blueprints also allow the user to further upgrade the weapon with mods.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.name: Cryogenic Atomizer - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.description: Blueprints for an improved version of the Cryogenic Atomizer. Redesigned nozzle and more concentrated fuel formula significantly increase the freezing properties of this weapon. These blueprints also allow the user to further upgrade the weapon with mods.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.name: Cryogenic Atomizer - Extreme
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.description: Blueprints for an improved version of the Cryogenic Atomizer. Redesigned nozzle and more concentrated fuel formula significantly increase the freezing properties of this weapon. These blueprints also allow the user to further upgrade the weapon with mods.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_morphium_l.name: Morphium Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/towers_morphium_l.description: Morphium reacts violently to stimulation with a boson projector, releasing energy in an opposite direction. It can be easily weaponized and doesn't require external power supply, or AI Hubs.
gui/menu/research/name/towers_morphium_l.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

awardsResolved.name: Morphium Tower
awardsResolved.desc: A defensive tower based on the Morphium technology. The unique properties of Morphium eliminate any additional power and AI requirements. Additionally, this tower can be placed directly on liquid pools.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_morphium_l.name: Morphium Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/towers_morphium_l.description: This advanced design of the Morphium Tower makes it possible to propel the material even further and with more force, granting it a longer range and higher damage output.

awardsResolved.name: Morphium Tower
awardsResolved.desc: A defensive tower based on the Morphium technology. The unique properties of Morphium eliminate any additional power and AI requirements. Additionally, this tower can be placed directly on liquid pools.

gui/menu/research/name/towers_morphium_l.name: Morphium Towers - lvl. 3

awardsResolved.name: Morphium Tower
awardsResolved.desc: A defensive tower based on the Morphium technology. The unique properties of Morphium eliminate any additional power and AI requirements. Additionally, this tower can be placed directly on liquid pools.

gui/menu/research/name/morphium_energy_l.name: Morphium Energy - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/morphium_energy_l.description: This research will allow the Riftbreaker to use the processes that naturally occur in liquid morphium to generate power and create specialized power plants that make use of this resource.

awardsResolved.name: Morphium Power Plant
awardsResolved.desc: This Power Plant captures the excess energy resulting from the nuclear synthesis and decay processes naturally occurring in Morphium. Provides the power grid with a steady flow of energy at a low upkeep cost.

gui/menu/research/name/morphium_energy_l.name: Morphium Energy - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/morphium_energy_l.description: A more detailed analysis of the fusion reactions occurring in morphium reveals potential for improvements in the design of the Morphium Power Plant, which will result in a better energy yield.

awardsResolved.name: Morphium Power Plant
awardsResolved.desc: This Power Plant captures the excess energy resulting from the nuclear synthesis and decay processes naturally occurring in Morphium. Provides the power grid with a steady flow of energy at a low upkeep cost.

gui/menu/research/name/morphium_energy_l.name: Morphium Energy - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/morphium_energy_l.description: A more detailed analysis of the fusion reactions occurring in morphium reveals potential for improvements in the design of the Morphium Power Plant, which will result in a better energy yield.

awardsResolved.name: Morphium Power Plant
awardsResolved.desc: This Power Plant captures the excess energy resulting from the nuclear synthesis and decay processes naturally occurring in Morphium. Provides the power grid with a steady flow of energy at a low upkeep cost.

gui/menu/research/name/energy_walls_lvl1.name: Energy Walls - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/energy_walls_lvl1.description: This set of blueprints allows The Riftbreaker to construct Energy Walls - barriers that utilize highly concentrated laser beams as the foundation for their structure. They are not as sturdy as solid walls, but much more deadly.
gui/menu/research/name/energy_walls_lvl1.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

awardsResolved.name: Energy Gate
awardsResolved.desc: An advanced form of a gate. Instead of relying on a solid structure, this version utilizes high-power laser beams to form a barrier. Coming into contact with this structure may be harmful.

gui/menu/research/name/energy_walls_lvl2.name: Energy Walls - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/energy_walls_lvl2.description: A more densely packed array of laser emitters makes this version of the Energy wall much more resilient to outside interference, increasing both the durability of the structure and the damage dealt.

awardsResolved.name: Energy Gate
awardsResolved.desc: An advanced form of a gate. Instead of relying on a solid structure, this version utilizes high-power laser beams to form a barrier. Coming into contact with this structure may be harmful.

awardsResolved.name: Energy Gate
awardsResolved.desc: An advanced form of a gate. Instead of relying on a solid structure, this version utilizes high-power laser beams to form a barrier. Coming into contact with this structure may be harmful.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_gatling_las.name: Gatling Laser Towers - Level 1
gui/menu/research/name/tower_gatling_las.description: Pinnacle of defensive technology, boasting a high-frequency pulse emitter that can rapidly shoot bursts of laser focused photons. The tower's advanced energy storage and targeting systems allow it to sustain a near-continuous stream of fire.

awardsResolved.name: Gatling Laser Tower
awardsResolved.desc: A large, energy-based defensive tower. Rapidly shoots powerful plasma projectiles. Its high stopping power comes at a cost of significant energy consumption.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_gatling_las.name: Gatling Laser Towers - Level 2
gui/menu/research/name/tower_gatling_las.description: The upgraded Gatling Laser Tower boasts a cutting-edge power core and sophisticated beam control systems that allow it to deliver even more devastating barrages of concentrated energy.

awardsResolved.name: Gatling Laser Tower
awardsResolved.desc: A large, energy-based defensive tower. Rapidly shoots powerful plasma projectiles. Its high stopping power comes at a cost of significant energy consumption.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_gatling_las.name: Gatling Laser Towers - Level 3

awardsResolved.name: Gatling Laser Tower
awardsResolved.desc: A large, energy-based defensive tower. Rapidly shoots powerful plasma projectiles. Its high stopping power comes at a cost of significant energy consumption.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_antimatter_.name: Antimatter Ball - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/skill_antimatter_.description: The Mecha-Suit's fusion core is utilized to create a potent weapon in a form of antimatter ball which flies forward and emits a deadly energy field as it travels. Upon impact, the ball unleashes a devastating explosion that inflicts immense damage.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_antimatter_.name: Antimatter Ball - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/skill_antimatter_.description: The upgraded version of the Antimatter Ball has undergone significant improvements, including advanced fusion technology which results in a much larger and more destructive explosion upon impact.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_antimatter_.name: Antimatter Ball - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/skill_antimatter_.description: The upgraded version of the Antimatter Ball has undergone significant improvements, including advanced fusion technology which results in a much larger and more destructive explosion upon impact.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_antimatter_.name: Antimatter Ball - Extreme
gui/menu/research/name/skill_antimatter_.description: The upgraded version of the Antimatter Ball has undergone significant improvements, including advanced fusion technology which results in a much larger and more destructive explosion upon impact.

gui/menu/research/name/wall_crystal_lvl1.name: Crystal Walls - Level 1
gui/menu/research/name/wall_crystal_lvl1.description: An innovative defensive structure composed of synthesized crystals sourced from the subterranean depths of Galatea 37. Synthetic crystals break into jagged shards that inflict significant damage on any nearby hostiles when the building is destroyed.
gui/menu/research/name/wall_crystal_lvl1.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

awardsResolved.name: Crystal Gate
awardsResolved.desc: An innovative defensive gate composed of synthesized crystals sourced from the subterranean depths of Galatea 37. Synthetic crystals break into jagged shards that inflict significant damage on any nearby hostiles when the building is destroyed.

gui/menu/research/name/wall_crystal_lvl2.name: Crystal Walls - Level 2
gui/menu/research/name/wall_crystal_lvl2.description: By introducing a complex lattice structure into the crystal synthesis process, the resulting walls become stronger and more resilient.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_acid.name: Acid Spewer - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_acid.description: Powerful weapon that spits out a stream of concentrated chemicals, leaving a pool of acid on the ground that damages enemies. While the stream doesn't deal any direct damage, the lingering pools of acid can quickly dissolve most of the weaker enemy units.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_acid.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_acid.name: Acid Spewer - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_acid.description: Incorporating advanced molecular disintegration algorithms and a sophisticated targeting system that delivers unparalleled accuracy and lethality on the battlefield, the weapon gains a lot more stopping power.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_acid.name: Acid Spewer - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_acid.description: Incorporating advanced molecular disintegration algorithms and a sophisticated targeting system that delivers unparalleled accuracy and lethality on the battlefield, the weapon gains a lot more stopping power.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_acid.description: Incorporating advanced molecular disintegration algorithms and a sophisticated targeting system that delivers unparalleled accuracy and lethality on the battlefield, the weapon gains a lot more stopping power.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.name: Cryo Spewer - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.description: The Cryo Spewer is a weapon that unleashes a powerful stream of liquid nitrogen to freeze and deal cryo damage to enemies. Its advanced design incorporates cutting-edge cryogenic technology, allowing it to deliver a precise and devastating effect on impact.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.name: Cryo Spewer - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.description: The advanced targeting system of the upgraded Cryo Spewer uses real-time data analysis and predictive algorithms to optimize the trajectory and impact of each shot, ensuring maximum effectiveness against even the most evasive targets.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_cryo.name: Cryo Spewer - Superior

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_fire.name: Fire Spewer - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_fire.description: The Fire Spewer utilizes advanced pyrotechnic technology to project a stream of superheated napalm that ignites upon contact with the ground, creating a devastating area of effect attack that can quickly incinerate waves of enemies.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_fire.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_fire.name: Fire Spewer - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_fire.description: Enhanced with advanced ignition and propulsion systems, the Upgraded Fire Spewer can launch napalm balls with greater accuracy, speed, and range, enabling the Riftbreaker to hit targets from further distances and with greater precision.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_fire.name: Fire Spewer - Superior

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_char.name: Charged Bomb - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_char.description: The Charged Bomb is a devastating weapon requiring strategic foresight and precise timing to unleash its destructive potential. Before deployment, it must be charged, channeling energy into a compact teleportation device. Once primed, the bomb is teleported to the designated target area, where it detonates with tremendous force after a brief countdown.

awardsResolved.name: Charged Bomb
awardsResolved.desc: Charged Attack: Hold the trigger and choose the target. The bomb will be armed and delivered to the selected spot.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_char.description: An enhanced iteration of its predecessor, boasting increased destructive power and enhanced targeting capabilities. gui/menu/research/name/skill_tornado_sta.description: Upon activation, the device harnesses atmospheric particles and kinetic energy to generate a localized, high-velocity vortex. This vortex rapidly expands into a full-scale tornado, which then moves forward in a predetermined direction.

gui/menu/research/name/skill_tornado_sup.name: Tornado - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/skill_tornado_sup.description: It features an upgraded atmospheric particle accelerator that generates a larger and more stable vortex. This results in a faster-forming tornado with increased rotational speed and kinetic energy.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_root.name: Root Gun - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_root.description: The Root Gun is a unique weapon that upon activation, summons roots from beneath the ground that travel towards the target, dealing continuous damage as they burrow through the earth.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_root.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_root.name: Root Gun - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_root.description: The upgraded Root Gun is built with lighter and more durable alloys, ensuring ease of operation, high efficiency, and higher damage output. It is a precise and deadly weapon, and a marvel of biomechanics.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_inse.description: The Wasp Launcher is a weapon that releases small, explosive insects at rapid speed. These insects automatically track and home in on targets with precision, ensuring maximum damage upon detonation. The concussive blast devastates enemies without the need for manual targeting.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_inse.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_inse.name: Wasp Launcher - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_inse.description: The upgraded version represents a significant advancement in insectoid weaponry, enhancing both firepower and targeting capabilities. This upgraded version maintains the rapid deployment of explosive insects while introducing improved tracking algorithms for even greater precision.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_flam.name: Flame Blade - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_flam.description: The Flame Blade is a formidable melee weapon that combines traditional blade craftsmanship with advanced pyrotechnic technology. In addition to its razor-sharp edge for close-quarters combat, the Flame Blade emits a wave of intense flames in a short-range arc upon striking, engulfing nearby enemies in searing heat.
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_flam.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_flam.name: Flame Blade - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_flam.description: An upgraded iteration of the classic Flame Blade, featuring improved pyrotechnic capabilities and enhanced combat functionality. Crafted from advanced nanocomposites and thermally conductive alloys, this blade unleashes waves of intense flames with each strike, engulfing foes in fiery devastation.

gui/menu/research/name/mech_weapons_flam.name: Flame Blade - Superior
