gui/menu/research/name/consumable_gas_gr.name: Gas Grenades - Standard
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_gas_gr.description: The Gas Grenade is a tactical consumable designed to incapacitate enemies through the deployment of a debilitating gas cloud. Once thrown, it releases a concentrated burst of noxious chemicals that impair vision, disrupt respiratory functions, and cause severe disorientation. This versatile weapon is ideal for crowd control and can turn the tide of battle by neutralizing multiple foes simultaneously.
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_gas_gr.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_gas_gr.name: Gas Grenades - Advanced
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_gas_gr.description: An upgraded version of the original Gas Grenade, offering enhanced incapacitation capabilities and a larger area of effect. This advanced consumable deploys a more potent gas mixture that disrupts enemy senses and bodily functions with greater efficiency. Ideal for high-stakes engagements, it ensures superior crowd control and battlefield dominance by neutralizing adversaries more effectively and for a longer duration.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_gas_gr.name: Gas Grenades - Superior
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_gas_gr.description: An upgraded version of the original Gas Grenade, offering enhanced incapacitation capabilities and a larger area of effect. This advanced consumable deploys a more potent gas mixture that disrupts enemy senses and bodily functions with greater efficiency. Ideal for high-stakes engagements, it ensures superior crowd control and battlefield dominance by neutralizing adversaries more effectively and for a longer duration.

gui/menu/research/name/consumable_gas_gr.name: Gas Grenades - Extreme
gui/menu/research/name/consumable_gas_gr.description: An upgraded version of the original Gas Grenade, offering enhanced incapacitation capabilities and a larger area of effect. This advanced consumable deploys a more potent gas mixture that disrupts enemy senses and bodily functions with greater efficiency. Ideal for high-stakes engagements, it ensures superior crowd control and battlefield dominance by neutralizing adversaries more effectively and for a longer duration.

gui/menu/research/name/wall_vine_lvl1.name: Vine Walls - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/wall_vine_lvl1.description: Vine Walls leverage advanced biomimetic engineering and regenerative plant technologies to offer dynamic and resilient fortifications. These living structures integrate seamlessly into defense strategies, providing both protection and tactical flexibility.
gui/menu/research/name/wall_vine_lvl1.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

gui/menu/research/name/wall_vine_lvl2.name: Vine Walls - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/wall_vine_lvl2.description: The structural composition of this wall has been upgraded with reinforced synthetic fibers and advanced biomaterials, providing greater durability and resistance to heavy attacks. This makes the walls more robust and long-lasting under sustained enemy fire.

gui/menu/research/name/wall_vine_lvl3.name: Vine Walls - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/wall_vine_lvl3.description: The structural composition of this wall has been upgraded with reinforced synthetic fibers and advanced biomaterials, providing greater durability and resistance to heavy attacks. This makes the walls more robust and long-lasting under sustained enemy fire.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_basic.name: Floating Immolator Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_basic.description: Rapidly shoots portions of napalm-like substance that stick to targets and set them on fire.The unique construction of the Floating Immolator Tower requires it to be built on a liquid surface. This drawback is mitigated by the tower's energy independence thanks to the built-in hydro generators.
gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_basic.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

awardsResolved.name: Floating Immolator Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Projectiles from this tower set their targets on fire, dealing both contact damage and damage over time. It's precise and has long range, but has to be built on liquid surface.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_basic.name: Floating Immolator Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_basic.description: An advanced upgrade of the original Floating Immolator Tower. It offers enhanced precision, increased damage output, and improved stability on liquid surfaces.
gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_basic.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

awardsResolved.name: Floating Immolator Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Projectiles from this tower set their targets on fire, dealing both contact damage and damage over time. It's precise and has long range, but has to be built on liquid surface.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_basic.name: Floating Immolator Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_basic.description: An advanced upgrade of the original Floating Immolator Tower. It offers enhanced precision, increased damage output, and improved stability on liquid surfaces.

awardsResolved.name: Floating Immolator Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Projectiles from this tower set their targets on fire, dealing both contact damage and damage over time. It's precise and has long range, but has to be built on liquid surface.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_big_l.name: Floating Piercer Towers - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_big_l.description: The Floating Piercer Tower is a defensive installation that launches long-range projectiles designed to pierce multiple targets and explode on final impact, causing a massive blast. Each projectile inflicts cryo damage, significantly slowing down all targets. This tower excels in disrupting enemy formations and slowing advances but must be constructed on a liquid surface.
gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_big_l.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

awardsResolved.name: Floating Piercer Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Floating Piercer Tower shoots long range projectiles that pierce multiple targets and explode on final impact with a massive blast. All targets are dealt cryo damage and get significantly slowed down. Must be built on a liquid surface.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_big_l.name: Floating Piercer Towers - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_big_l.description: This upgrade integrates next-generation cryogenic and ballistic technologies, providing unmatched performance and reliability in aquatic environments. With advanced targeting and stabilization systems, it ensures superior precision and effectiveness in combat.

awardsResolved.name: Floating Piercer Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Floating Piercer Tower shoots long range projectiles that pierce multiple targets and explode on final impact with a massive blast. All targets are dealt cryo damage and get significantly slowed down. Must be built on a liquid surface.

gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_big_l.name: Floating Piercer Towers - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/tower_water_big_l.description: This upgrade integrates next-generation cryogenic and ballistic technologies, providing unmatched performance and reliability in aquatic environments. With advanced targeting and stabilization systems, it ensures superior precision and effectiveness in combat.

awardsResolved.name: Floating Piercer Tower
awardsResolved.desc: Floating Piercer Tower shoots long range projectiles that pierce multiple targets and explode on final impact with a massive blast. All targets are dealt cryo damage and get significantly slowed down. Must be built on a liquid surface.

gui/menu/research/name/supercooling_lvl2.name: Super Cooling - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/supercooling_lvl2.description: Thanks to the discoveries made on the Magma Biome it is possible to try and replicate the cooling properties of some of Galatean plants. The resulting substance would be a much more efficient coolant than regular water.

awardsResolved.name: Supercoolant Refinery
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Supercoolant resource for advanced buildings.

gui/menu/research/name/supercooling_lvl3.name: Super Cooling - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/supercooling_lvl3.description: Thanks to the discoveries made on the Magma Biome it is possible to try and replicate the cooling properties of some of Galatean plants. The resulting substance would be a much more efficient coolant than regular water.

awardsResolved.name: Supercoolant Refinery
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Supercoolant resource for advanced buildings.

gui/menu/research/name/ionizer_lvl2.name: Solid State Ionization - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/ionizer_lvl2.description: Solid State Ionization technology enables creation of Plasma from solid materials like Palladium thanks to the use of hyper sensitive quantum shift boson capture.

awardsResolved.name: Ionizer
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Plasma out of other resources.

gui/menu/research/name/ionizer_lvl3.name: Solid State Ionization - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/ionizer_lvl3.description: Solid State Ionization technology enables creation of Plasma from solid materials like Palladium thanks to the use of hyper sensitive quantum shift boson capture.

awardsResolved.name: Ionizer
awardsResolved.desc: Produces Plasma out of other resources.

gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.name: Quantum Cortex Lab - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.description: This research unlocks the construction plans for the Quantum Cortex Laboratory. The structure significantly accelerates research data processing, improving analysis and integration of new technologies.
gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.requirementTooltip: This research is unlocked after completing a campaign objective.

awardsResolved.name: Quantum Cortex Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Advanced Quantum Computing datacenter. Enables reprocessing of megastructure schematics and greatly increases research speed.

gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.name: Quantum Cortex Lab - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.description: This research enables the construction of the Coriolis Plasma Nullifier component for the Quantum Research Lab. It increases the lab's processing speed.

awardsResolved.name: Quantum Cortex Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Advanced Quantum Computing datacenter. Enables reprocessing of megastructure schematics and greatly increases research speed.

gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.name: Quantum Cortex Lab - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.description: This research enables the construction of the Stabilized Hypercondensate Centrifuge component for the Quantum Research Lab. It increases the lab's processing speed.

awardsResolved.name: Quantum Cortex Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Advanced Quantum Computing datacenter. Enables reprocessing of megastructure schematics and greatly increases research speed.

gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.name: Quantum Cortex Lab - lvl. 4
gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.description: This research enables the construction of the Supercharged Plasma Ion Accelerator component for the Quantum Research Lab. It increases the lab's processing speed.

awardsResolved.name: Quantum Cortex Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Advanced Quantum Computing datacenter. Enables reprocessing of megastructure schematics and greatly increases research speed.

gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.name: Quantum Cortex Lab - lvl. 5
gui/menu/research/name/quantum_cortex_la.description: This research enables the construction of the Kotiuk's Brown Matter Recylers component for the Quantum Research Lab. It increases the lab's processing speed to its maximum.

awardsResolved.name: Quantum Cortex Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Advanced Quantum Computing datacenter. Enables reprocessing of megastructure schematics and greatly increases research speed.

gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab.name: Hydroponic Lab - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab.description: This research unlocks the construction plans for the Hydroponic Sustainability Lab. It accelerates plant regrowth within the location where it is built. The lab produces biological resources sustainably, securing the colony's self-sufficiency.

awardsResolved.name: Hydroponic Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Conducts research and development of modified flora. Greatly increases vegetation growth speed within the location it is built in.

gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab_lv.name: Hydroponic Lab - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab_lv.description: The lab is upgraded with a second Nutrient Flow Processing Station that further accelerates vegetation regrowth. Perfect for boosting local biomass growth.

awardsResolved.name: Hydroponic Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Conducts research and development of modified flora. Greatly increases vegetation growth speed within the location it is built in.

gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab_lv.name: Hydroponic Lab - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab_lv.description: The lab is upgraded with two additional Nutrient Flow Processing Stations that further accelerate vegetation regrowth. Cultivation speed is increased.

awardsResolved.name: Hydroponic Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Conducts research and development of modified flora. Greatly increases vegetation growth speed within the location it is built in.

gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab_lv.name: Hydroponic Lab - lvl. 4
gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab_lv.description: The lab is upgraded with Nutrient Flow Processing Stations 5 and 6. vegetation growth is increased Hydroponic Lab's efficiency is increased to 75%.

awardsResolved.name: Hydroponic Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Conducts research and development of modified flora. Greatly increases vegetation growth speed within the location it is built in.

gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab_lv.name: Hydroponic Lab - lvl. 5
gui/menu/research/name/hydroponic_lab_lv.description: This research unlocks the final Hydroponic Sustainability Lab components, which bring the Nanopollinator tower's efficiency to 100%.

awardsResolved.name: Hydroponic Lab
awardsResolved.desc: Conducts research and development of modified flora. Greatly increases vegetation growth speed within the location it is built in.

gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center.name: Nanobot Center - lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center.description: This research unlocks the construction plans for the Nanobot Swarm Control Center. The megastructure enables remote operation of a limited number of additional AI Cores in all planetary locations.

awardsResolved.name: Nanobot Center
awardsResolved.desc: Manages large nanobot construction swarms over long distances. Provides additional AI Cores in all planetary locations.

gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center_lv.name: Nanobot Center - lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center_lv.description: This research enables the construction of the Nanite Forge component for the Nanobot Swarm Control Center. It increases the number of remotely operated AI cores.

awardsResolved.name: Nanobot Center
awardsResolved.desc: Manages large nanobot construction swarms over long distances. Provides additional AI Cores in all planetary locations.

gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center_lv.name: Nanobot Center - lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center_lv.description: This research enables the construction of the Resource Atomization Accelerator component for the Nanobot Swarm Control Center. It increases the number of remotely operated AI cores.

awardsResolved.name: Nanobot Center
awardsResolved.desc: Manages large nanobot construction swarms over long distances. Provides additional AI Cores in all planetary locations.

gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center_lv.name: Nanobot Center - lvl. 4
gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center_lv.description: This research enables the construction of the Nanobot Recycler component for the Nanobot Swarm Control Center. It increases the number of remotely operated AI cores.

awardsResolved.name: Nanobot Center
awardsResolved.desc: Manages large nanobot construction swarms over long distances. Provides additional AI Cores in all planetary locations.

gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center_lv.name: Nanobot Center - lvl. 5
gui/menu/research/name/nanobot_center_lv.description: This research enables the construction of the second Nanite Forge component for the Nanobot Swarm Control Center. It increases the number of remotely operated AI cores to its maximum.

awardsResolved.name: Nanobot Center
awardsResolved.desc: Manages large nanobot construction swarms over long distances. Provides additional AI Cores in all planetary locations.

gui/menu/research/name/arcology_workshop.name: Arcology Workshop
gui/menu/research/name/arcology_workshop.description: This research unlocks the blueprint for the Arcology Workshop. It allows the arcology to be launched into orbit, enabling non-invasive colonization and long-term planetary presence.

awardsResolved.name: Arcology Workshop
awardsResolved.desc: Enables the construction of Arcologies - self-sufficient structures capable of sustaining life in any environment.

gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens -  lvl. 1
gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.description: A lens capable of bending space to create zero-gravity conditions. It allows for the construction of structures on an unimaginable scale and reveals solid resource deposits across the entire map, even in unexplored areas.

awardsResolved.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens
awardsResolved.desc: Enables the construction of gigantic structures in zero-gravity environments. Allows for object detection through geomagnetic mapping.

gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens -  lvl. 2
gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.description: This upgrade enhances the lens with deep-spectrum thermal and gas anomaly scanning. It enables the detection of geothermal faults and natural flammable gas vents across the operational zone.

awardsResolved.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens
awardsResolved.desc: Enables the construction of gigantic structures in zero-gravity environments. Allows for object detection through geomagnetic mapping.

gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens -  lvl. 3
gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.description: The lens is upgraded with biome-aware terrain analysis algorithms. This enables the detection of hidden biocaches within its scanning range.

awardsResolved.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens
awardsResolved.desc: Enables the construction of gigantic structures in zero-gravity environments. Allows for object detection through geomagnetic mapping.

gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens -  lvl. 4
gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.description: Advanced spectral filters allow the lens to identify major bioanomalies and power wells. This enables precise planning of base locations and research structures.

awardsResolved.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens
awardsResolved.desc: Enables the construction of gigantic structures in zero-gravity environments. Allows for object detection through geomagnetic mapping.

gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens -  lvl. 5
gui/menu/research/name/gravitational_hyp.description: The lens gains deep subsurface scanning capabilities. It reveals hidden underground resource deposits and buried treasuries across the entire map.

awardsResolved.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens
awardsResolved.desc: Enables the construction of gigantic structures in zero-gravity environments. Allows for object detection through geomagnetic mapping.

gui/hud/building_name/solid_material_sto.name: Solid Material Storage
gui/hud/building_name/solid_material_sto.description: Automatically gathers (using rift technology) and stores solid materials. It expands the global storage space for all solid materials.

gui/hud/building_name/ai_hub.name: AI Hub
gui/hud/building_name/ai_hub.description: Provides AI Cores that are required to manage more buildings with artificial intelligence like Sentinel Towers or the Repair Facility.

gui/hud/building_name/wall_gate.name: Wall Gate
gui/hud/building_name/wall_gate.description: Opens automatically when the Mecha-Suit is in close proximity. Doesn't require Energy to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/wall_small_floor.name: Heightened Wall Floor
gui/hud/building_name/wall_small_floor.description: Provides a higher defense position for the Mecha-Suit allowing it to shoot above walls and defend the base from inside of the walls.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_drone_attack.name: Attack Drone Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_drone_attack.description: Spawns defensive drones which hoover in the tower's operational radius and attack all enemies that come in range.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_heavy_artill.name: Heavy Artillery Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_heavy_artill.description: Shoots mini nuke explosive shells at very long distances. Can protect the base from enemies shooting from a long distance. Use with Radars to shoot farther than its viewing range.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_mine_layer.name: Mine Layer Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_mine_layer.description: Spawns mines in the area of operation which in time create a mine field that is very hard for enemies to go through.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_minigun.name: Minigun Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_minigun.description: Minigun version of the base tower. Very high fire rate makes it effective against a wide range of enemies.

gui/hud/building_name/headquarters.name: Headquarters
gui/hud/building_name/headquarters.description: The central building in your base. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct, includes a rift portal and provides storage facilities. Protect this building at all cost.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_basic.name: Sentinel Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_basic.description: Basic defensive tower. Shoots high speed energy projectiles at a limited rate of fire.

gui/hud/building_name/carbonium_synthesi.name: Carbonium Synthesizer
gui/hud/building_name/carbonium_synthesi.description: Synthesizes Carbonium from Energy. Can be used as an infinite source of Carbonium but consumes a lot of energy in the process which makes it not very economical.

gui/hud/building_name/ironium_synthesize.name: Ironium Synthesizer
gui/hud/building_name/ironium_synthesize.description: Synthesizes Ironium using Energy. Can be used in an emergency situation when Ironium is depleted but Energy is abundant.

gui/hud/building_name/fusion_powerplant.name: Fusion Powerplant
gui/hud/building_name/fusion_powerplant.description: Very large energy output. Produces plasma resource as a byproduct.

gui/hud/building_name/plasma_converter.name: Plasma Converter
gui/hud/building_name/plasma_converter.description: Converts Plasma into Supercharged Plasma by using large amounts of energy.

gui/hud/building_name/rare_element_mine.name: Rare Element Mine
gui/hud/building_name/rare_element_mine.description: Mines rare resources like Uranium, Titanium and Palladium. Must be placed on an ore deposit and powered with Energy to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/nuclear_powerplant.name: Nuclear Powerplant
gui/hud/building_name/nuclear_powerplant.description: It has very large Energy output. Requires Uranium to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/uranium_centrifuge.name: Uranium Centrifuge
gui/hud/building_name/uranium_centrifuge.description: Refines Uranium Ore. Produces Uranium for use in powerplants and crafting.

gui/hud/building_name/shield_generator.name: Shield Generator
gui/hud/building_name/shield_generator.description: Adds shield protection to all structures in a radius.

gui/hud/building_name/carbonium_powerpla.name: Carbonium Powerplant
gui/hud/building_name/carbonium_powerpla.description: Must be built on top of Carbonium ore deposit. Provides good power output but uses up resources from the deposit. Can use only unrefined Carbonium straight from the ground.

gui/hud/building_name/geothermal_powerpl.name: Geothermal Powerplant
gui/hud/building_name/geothermal_powerpl.description: Must be built on top of a Geothermal Vent. Produces significant amounts of energy.

gui/hud/building_name/solar_panels.name: Solar Panels
gui/hud/building_name/solar_panels.description: Provides Energy during the day hours. Shuts down automatically during the night, or when the sun is not visible e.g. during intense storms.

gui/hud/building_name/wind_turbine.name: Wind Turbine
gui/hud/building_name/wind_turbine.description: Provides a limited amount of energy depending on wind strength.

gui/hud/building_name/short_range_radar.name: Radar
gui/hud/building_name/short_range_radar.description: Provides radar coverage and enables defense towers to shoot beyond their viewing range. Detects hostile entities and shows them on the map. Great for spotting incoming attacks.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_plasma.name: Plasma Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_plasma.description: Shoots high powered energy projectiles with a decent fire rate. It's quite universal and can defend your base against creatures that are resistant to physical damage. Uses energy to shoot so can be a good diversification if your tower ammo production is struggling to keep up.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_flamer.name: Flamer Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_flamer.description: Sprays burning fluid. Short range but very effective against numerous small enemies. Requires a Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/communications_hub.name: Communication HUB
gui/hud/building_name/communications_hub.description: Allows communicating with Earth via quantum entanglement and downloading schematics for buildings and upgrades. Enables research. Transmission is instant regardless of distance but has very low bandwidth.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_artillery.name: Artillery Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_artillery.description: Shoots explosive shells at long distances. Very effective against groups of enemies. Can shoot farther than its viewing range. Requires a Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_rockets.name: Rocket Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_rockets.description: Shoots explosive rockets at the enemies. Best used against groups of enemies or creatures that are vulnerable to area damage.

gui/hud/building_name/energy_connector.name: Energy Connector
gui/hud/building_name/energy_connector.description: Connects buildings to the power grid within its operational radius.

gui/hud/building_name/energy_storage.name: Energy Storage
gui/hud/building_name/energy_storage.description: Stores a significant amount of energy. Best used with intermittent power sources like Solar Panels to create an energy buffer.

gui/hud/building_name/plant_biomass_powe.name: Plant Biomass Powerplant
gui/hud/building_name/plant_biomass_powe.description: Produces energy out of Plant Biomass from destroyed foliage.

gui/hud/building_name/mining_elevator.name: Mining Drill
gui/hud/building_name/mining_elevator.description: The Mining Drill is a highly specialized building that allows the Riftbreaker to breach the layers of the planet's crust and safely reach levels below the surface.

gui/hud/building_name/outpost.name: Outpost
gui/hud/building_name/outpost.description: A miniature version of the Headquarters building. Can be constructed during planetary missions to transport resources from remote bases to the main base via rift technology. It allows the Mecha-Suit to reconstruct.

gui/hud/building_name/repellent_drone_hu.name: Repellent Drone Hub
gui/hud/building_name/repellent_drone_hu.description: Repellent Drone Hub sends out specialized drones that spray the target area with a repellent substance according to the Riftbreaker's current needs.

gui/hud/building_name/seismic_laboratory.name: Seismic Laboratory
gui/hud/building_name/seismic_laboratory.description: This building contains very precise seismographic equipment that collects data for large-scale geological analysis of the area. Needs a constant supply of water for cooling purposes.

gui/hud/building_name/carbonium_factory.name: Carbonium Factory
gui/hud/building_name/carbonium_factory.description: Produces Carbonium. Must be placed on Carbonium Ore and powered with Energy to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/steel_factory.name: Ironium Factory
gui/hud/building_name/steel_factory.description: Produces Ironium. Must be placed on Iron Ore deposits.

gui/hud/building_name/base_lamp.name: Basic Lamp
gui/hud/building_name/base_lamp.description: Provides light during night time, must be connected to the energy grid.

gui/hud/building_name/portal.name: Rift Portal
gui/hud/building_name/portal.description: Creates a rift in spacetime allowing immediate travel to its location.

gui/hud/building_name/animal_biomass_pow.name: Animal Biomass Powerplant
gui/hud/building_name/animal_biomass_pow.description: Produces energy out of Animal Biomass from fallen enemies.

gui/hud/building_name/ammunition_storage.name: Ammo Storage
gui/hud/building_name/ammunition_storage.description: Automatically gathers and stores ammunition. It expands the global storage space for all ammunition.

gui/hud/building_name/gas_powerplant.name: Gas Powerplant
gui/hud/building_name/gas_powerplant.description: Produces a significant amount of energy but requires Flammable Gas to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/bio_composter.name: Bio Composter
gui/hud/building_name/bio_composter.description: Produces Flammable Gas out of Plant Biomass.

gui/hud/building_name/gas_filtering_plan.name: Gas Filtering Plant
gui/hud/building_name/gas_filtering_plan.description: Refines Sludge to produce Flammable Gas which is used as fuel by the Gas Powerplants. Requires a constant flow of sludge that can be connected by using pipelines.

gui/hud/building_name/repair_facility.name: Repair Facility
gui/hud/building_name/repair_facility.description: Repairs damaged buildings in a radius around this facility using automated drones.

gui/hud/building_name/fusion_field_accel.name: Fusion Field Accelerator
gui/hud/building_name/fusion_field_accel.description: Creates a powerful nuclear fusion field that accelerates condensed hyper particles to faster than light speed. Super charged hyper particles contained within a controlled magnetic field become the fabric of the quantum gate portal.

gui/hud/building_name/hyper_particle_con.name: Hyper Particle Condenser
gui/hud/building_name/hyper_particle_con.description: Generates and condenses dark matter hyper particles using an array of Palladium core quantum condensers.

gui/hud/building_name/quantum_gate_stabi.name: Quantum Gate Stabilizer
gui/hud/building_name/quantum_gate_stabi.description: Required to stabilize the quantum gate that contains the actual rift portal. Without this component quantum gate malfunction may disintegrate the object entering the portal.

gui/hud/building_name/rift_station.name: Rift Station
gui/hud/building_name/rift_station.description: This is the big rift that can connect planets in different parts of the galaxy. Can open a rift back to Earth.

gui/hud/building_name/liquid_material_st.name: Liquid Material Storage
gui/hud/building_name/liquid_material_st.description: Stores a significant amount of liquid or gas. Can store only one type of resource at a time and needs to be connected with Pipelines to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/liquid_pump.name: Liquid Pump
gui/hud/building_name/liquid_pump.description: Pumps liquid resources from pools found around the planet. Pumps can not operate too close to each other.

gui/hud/building_name/water_filtering_pl.name: Water Filtering Plant
gui/hud/building_name/water_filtering_pl.description: Purifies contaminated fluids like mud and produces clean water. Requires Energy to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/planet_scanner.name: Orbital Scanner
gui/hud/building_name/planet_scanner.description: Constantly scans the whole planet to detect valuable resources, artifacts, new species and other phenomena outside the main base area. Allows rift jumping to planetary missions.

gui/hud/building_name/pipe_junction.name: Pipe Junction
gui/hud/building_name/pipe_junction.description: This structure allows the Riftbreaker to cross two pipelines that transport different types of liquid resources without mixing them up.

gui/hud/building_name/pipe_straight.name: Pipeline
gui/hud/building_name/pipe_straight.description: Transports liquids, gasses and plasma. Used to connect various buildings that require a fuel source to operate. Can transport and store only one type or resource at a time.

gui/hud/building_name/laboratory.name: Laboratory
gui/hud/building_name/laboratory.description: Provides advanced research facilities that are required to develop technologies based on extreaterrestrial fauna and flora.

gui/hud/building_name/rift_magnetic_stab.name: Rift Magnetic Stabilizer
gui/hud/building_name/rift_magnetic_stab.description: Stabilizes the big rift portal. Needs Water or Supercoolant to operate.

gui/hud/building_name/liquid_compressor.name: Liquid Compressor
gui/hud/building_name/liquid_compressor.description: This facility is used to compress liquid resources on a subatomic level to allow their transportation over long distances using the Rift Technology.

gui/hud/building_name/liquid_decompresso.name: Liquid Decompressor
gui/hud/building_name/liquid_decompresso.description: The reception terminal for liquids transported using the Rift Technology. This facility restores the liquids treated by the Liquid Compressor to their original form.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_lightning.name: Lightning Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_lightning.description: The weaponized electromagnet embedded within this tower creates an enormous disparity between itself and all organic matter around it. Thanks to that, it can create a powerful, but controllable electric arc that can affect multiple attackers.

gui/hud/building_name/energy_pylon.name: Energy Pylon
gui/hud/building_name/energy_pylon.description: The Energy Relay system allows the Riftbreaker to transfer energy over long distances without the use of Energy Connectors. At least two pylons are necessary for this technology to work properly.

gui/hud/building_name/drone_mine.name: Drone Mine
gui/hud/building_name/drone_mine.description: The Drone Mine is a hub for a fleet of automated drones that will collect solid resources of all varieties within the operating radius of the Mine.

gui/hud/building_name/loot_collector.name: Loot Collector
gui/hud/building_name/loot_collector.description: The Loot Collector Tower is a hub for automated drones that will scavenge all the resources and materials dropped within the tower's area of operation.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_portal.name: Portal Bomb Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_portal.description: Using a short-range Rift Portal, this defensive tower will deliver an armed warhead, prioritizing long-range hostile units. Thanks to instant delivery of the payload, this tower circumvents the problems connected with conventional artillery use.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_acid_spitter.name: Acid Spitter Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_acid_spitter.description: This defensive tower covers the ground with highly concentrated hydrofuoric acid. The acid will damage any organic matter that comes into contact with it.

gui/hud/building_name/trap_fire.name: Trap - Fire
gui/hud/building_name/trap_fire.description: Upon activation by a hostile creature, this trap sprays napalm all over the surrounding area, causing organic matter to catch fire and take fire damage. Can only be activated a limited number of times before it needs to be replaced.

gui/hud/building_name/gas_extractor.name: Gas Extractor
gui/hud/building_name/gas_extractor.description: Place this structure on top of a Gas Vent to extinguish it and start collecting the Flammable Gas escaping from beneath the ground.

gui/hud/building_name/bio_condenser.name: Biomass Condenser
gui/hud/building_name/bio_condenser.description: This building extracts biomass from mud, leaving the organic remains behind. They are later fermented and turned into sludge.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_hcm.name: HCM Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_hcm.description: A silo, housing a massive rocket launched vertically and aimed at distant targets. Once the rocket reaches destination, it releases multiple explosive devices that cover a very large area. Gas supply required.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_power_rod.name: Power Rod Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_power_rod.description: The Power Rod Tower launches long-range warheads. Upon reaching the target, a Power Rod emerges from the warhead. It produces high-voltage electric arcs, damaging nearby units.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_shotgun.name: Shotgun Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_shotgun.description: This tower utilizes High-Caliber Tower Ammo. It rapidly shoots short-ranged volleys of small projectiles. It is very effective against large groups of small attackers.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/rocket_la.name: Rocket Launcher
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/rocket_la.description: Charged attack: Can load up to five times more missiles at once. Bigger damage.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/blaster.name: Blaster
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/blaster.description: Charged attack: Accumulating blaster energy results in a powerful plasma blast that destroys targets in a wide radius.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/burst_rif.name: Burst Rifle
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/burst_rif.description: Charged attack: Two times more projectiles in a burst with a bigger damage and penetration power.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/shotgun.name: Shotgun
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/shotgun.description: Charged attack: Longer range and narrow spread. Bigger damage and penetration power.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/sniper_ri.name: High Caliber Rifle
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/sniper_ri.description: Charged attack: Adds small splash damage to every hit. Bigger damage and penetration power.

gui/hud/building_name/armory.name: Armory
gui/hud/building_name/armory.description: Allows crafting of new weapons and items. Automatically produces and instantly transports ammunition and supplies to the Mecha-Suit.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/heavy_pla.name: Heavy Plasma
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/heavy_pla.description: Charged attack: Forms a plasma barrier in front of the user, protecting them from all incoming projectiles.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/bouncing_.name: Bouncing Blades
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/bouncing_.description: Charged Attack: The weapon releases several spinning blades in a wider cone.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/lava_gun.name: Immolator
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/lava_gun.description: Charged Attack: The weapon fires a large projectile that sets things on fire in a large radius.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/semi_auto.name: Repeater Rifle
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/semi_auto.description: Charged Attack: Shoots several projectiles in a cone pattern.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/mortar.name: Mortar
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/mortar.description: Charged Attack: Allows you to shoot a barrage of several projectiles at the target.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_laser.name: Laser Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_laser.description: Shoots a constant beam of energy at a target. The beam gets more powerful while constantly hitting the target so its best used against large and heavily armored units.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_railgun.name: Railgun Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_railgun.description: Shoots a really powerful, piercing energy beam. Very low fire rate. Each shot consumes a significant portion of Energy from the main energy supply.

gui/hud/building_name/flora_collector.name: Harvesting Station
gui/hud/building_name/flora_collector.description: Sends out automatic drones that gather alien flora in a radius around the building. This process generates all kinds of resources depending on what was gathered.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_shockwave.name: Shockwave Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_shockwave.description: Emits powerful waves that freeze and damages enemies in a radius. Very good for slowing down enemy hordes and against creates vulnerable to cryo damage.

gui/hud/building_name/supercoolant_refin.name: Supercoolant Refinery
gui/hud/building_name/supercoolant_refin.description: Produces Supercoolant resource for advanced buildings.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/railgun.name: Railgun
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/railgun.description: Charged attack: Shoots up to three times more beams. Bigger damage.

gui/hud/building_name/ionizer.name: Ionizer
gui/hud/building_name/ionizer.description: Produces Plasma out of other resources.

gui/hud/building_name/magma_powerplant.name: Magma Powerplant
gui/hud/building_name/magma_powerplant.description: Uses liquid Magma to produce large amounts of Energy. Needs to be connected to liquid Magma with Pipelines.

gui/hud/building_name/rift_magnetic_stab.name: Advanced Magnetic Stabilizer
gui/hud/building_name/rift_magnetic_stab.description: Stabilizes the big rift portal with alien based tech. More advanced than standard version. Does not need cooling.

gui/hud/building_name/cryo_station.name: Cryo Station
gui/hud/building_name/cryo_station.description: A self-powered rapid environment cooling station. This building can be placed to quickly reduce the temperature in very hot environments to enable other structures to be built.

gui/hud/building_name/research_station.name: Research Station
gui/hud/building_name/research_station.description: This building contains a robust set of sensors and analysis facilities. It is used to gather research data from objects or anomalies that are too complicated to be scanned by Mr. Rigg's field equipment.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_alien_influe.name: Morphium Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_alien_influe.description: A defensive tower based on the Morphium technology. The unique properties of Morphium eliminate any additional power and AI requirements. Additionally, this tower can be placed directly on liquid pools.

gui/hud/building_name/morphium_powerplan.name: Morphium Power Plant
gui/hud/building_name/morphium_powerplan.description: This Power Plant captures the excess energy resulting from the nuclear synthesis and decay processes naturally occurring in Morphium. Provides the power grid with a steady flow of energy at a low upkeep cost.

gui/hud/building_name/wall_gate_energy.name: Energy Gate
gui/hud/building_name/wall_gate_energy.description: An advanced form of a gate. Instead of relying on a solid structure, this version utilizes high-power laser beams to form a barrier. Coming into contact with this structure may be harmful.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_gatling_lase.name: Gatling Laser Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_gatling_lase.description: A large, energy-based defensive tower. Rapidly shoots powerful plasma projectiles. Its high stopping power comes at a cost of significant energy consumption.

gui/hud/building_name/wall_gate_crystal.name: Crystal Gate
gui/hud/building_name/wall_gate_crystal.description: An innovative defensive gate composed of synthesized crystals sourced from the subterranean depths of Galatea 37. Synthetic crystals break into jagged shards that inflict significant damage on any nearby hostiles when the building is destroyed.

gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/charged_b.name: Charged Bomb
gui/menu/inventory/weapon_name/charged_b.description: Charged Attack: Hold the trigger and choose the target. The bomb will be armed and delivered to the selected spot.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_water_basic.name: Floating Immolator Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_water_basic.description: Projectiles from this tower set their targets on fire, dealing both contact damage and damage over time. It's precise and has long range, but has to be built on liquid surface.

gui/hud/building_name/tower_water_big.name: Floating Piercer Tower
gui/hud/building_name/tower_water_big.description: Floating Piercer Tower shoots long range projectiles that pierce multiple targets and explode on final impact with a massive blast. All targets are dealt cryo damage and get significantly slowed down. Must be built on a liquid surface.

gui/hud/building_name/quantum_cortex_lab.name: Quantum Cortex Lab
gui/hud/building_name/quantum_cortex_lab.description: Advanced Quantum Computing datacenter. Enables reprocessing of megastructure schematics and greatly increases research speed.

gui/hud/building_name/hydroponic_lab.name: Hydroponic Lab
gui/hud/building_name/hydroponic_lab.description: Conducts research and development of modified flora. Greatly increases vegetation growth speed within the location it is built in.

gui/hud/building_name/nanobot_center.name: Nanobot Center
gui/hud/building_name/nanobot_center.description: Manages large nanobot construction swarms over long distances. Provides additional AI Cores in all planetary locations.

gui/hud/building_name/arcology_workshop.name: Arcology Workshop
gui/hud/building_name/arcology_workshop.description: Enables the construction of Arcologies - self-sufficient structures capable of sustaining life in any environment.

gui/hud/building_name/gravitational_hype.name: Gravitational Hyper Lens
gui/hud/building_name/gravitational_hype.description: Enables the construction of gigantic structures in zero-gravity environments. Allows for object detection through geomagnetic mapping.
